name: Luxury studio 'Spiegelhof' in the centre of Ghent
description:
The top floor of our house in the center of Ghent is a tastefully and practically furnished studio with a separate sleeping area, sitting area, dining area and kitchenette. There is a private bathroom with rain shower. The studio is equipped with all amenities and comfort.

The space
The studio occupies the entire top floor (2nd floor) of our house.
The space is comfortable and tastefully decorated with an eye for detail. You have a separate bathroom with shower and sink. Shower gel, soap, shampoo, hairdryer and care products are provided. There is a kitchenette with microwave and refrigerator in the studio. You have a Nespresso machine, kettle, egg cooker, milk foam maker, coffee and Nespresso coffee cups and tea. A double bed with quality mattress (memory foam such as the Tempur brand) ensures that you enjoy a wonderful night's sleep. There is a smart television with Chromecast and Netflix in the sleeping area. You can use the music system including a recor
neighborhood_overview:
We live in a quiet and pleasant neighborhood within walking distance of the historic city center. The historic center of Ghent is within walking distance of our house. After a busy day you can enjoy your own studio in peace and quiet. The room has recently been insulated. You are not bothered by outside noise.
There is a supermarket around the corner and a bakery on the church square.
There are several restaurants within walking distance.
host_about: We are living in a house in the center of beautifull Ghent. Just a 10 minutes walk away from the historical center. We like traveling to cities. It will be a pleasure to be the host of travellers who vist Ghent or other cities in Belgium. We are very interested in cultural activities. Ghent offers a unique choice of cultural activities: musea, concerthall's, cinemas, opera, expositions,... We will offer you a warm welcome en hope you enjoy your stay.

name: Flat close to Sint-Pieters Station!
description:
This well-located and comfortable one-bedroom flat on the ground floor of a city house allows you to discover Ghent at ease, whether you come by train or car. The heart of the city is at walking distance while you sleep in a quiet street.

The space
Within the city-centre of Ghent - 5 min walk from the main railway station Sint-Pieters, nearby musea (SMAK, STAM, De Bijloke) or a 15 min walk to the Graslei, Korenmarkt, you can rent a beautifully renovated ground-floor flat in a city-house.

I am the owner of the house and we live on the second and third floor of the house. This makes it easy in case you have questions and also for the check-in and check-out.

Guest access
The flat is easily accessible for everyone as it is on the ground floor. You will have your own private kitchen with laundry facilities, a comfortable bedroom with direct access to the garden and a spacious bathroom with a dressing, cloth-hangers, and all bathroom n
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in a dead-end street - so it is quiet and no traffic is passing through, especially in weekends and evenings. There is a square in front of the house with parking facilities.

There are bakeries, restaurants and shops in the vicinity. A nice restaurant with take-away facilities is just around the corner. And the heart of the city is a stroll away along the river.

If you want to go for sports (jogging, out or indoor swimming) and nature/relaxation, you can walk to the Blaarmeersen which has all major sports facilities.
host_about: I am a legal advisor who always worked internationally and used to travel extensively. Keen on meeting people, I like to assist newcomers in discovering my home town both for their professional or private reasons. I expect guests to have a certain maturity and to communicate with mutual respect.

name: Modern studio's in Ghent centre
description:
The space
We offer luxury studio's, a penthouse suite with terrace and a 2-bed room apartment for rent on short term in the historical city centre of Ghent.
All accommodation is fully furnished and equipped with all modern comfort:
Double bed ; Dining corner & kitchen with microwave, grill fridge & freezer ; Lounge area with flat screen tv & wifi internet access; Personal bathroom with shower; Individual central heating; Videophone.
We are located in the historical heart of the city centre of Ghent. The city centre of Ghent is pedestrian area - traffic free - but our studio's & penthouse can be reached by car with parking on the square or in the underground parking of the Vrijdagmarkt.

Ideal for discovering Ghent on foot:
Within 2 min walk to historical sights with its churches, squares, medieval architecture, musea, shops & restaurants:
200m Vrijdagmarkt with its bars & restaurants
500m Korenmarkt at the intersection of
host_about:
I want to welcome foreign guests in the city center of Ghent. Place 2 stay offers modern studios in the middle of the historical centre of Ghent only 200 metres from Vrijdagmarkt. We offer studio's, a penthouse and a 2-bedroom apartment. They each feature a seating area with flat-screen cable TV and free wireless hotspot. The studios include an open-plan kitchen with an oven, fridge freezer and microwave as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Each Place 2 stay also has a bathroom with a heated towel rail. The Korenmarkt and St-Braafs Square featuring the Belfort are a 5-minute walk from Place 2 stay. Alijn House Museum is 400 metres away. Bruges is 40 minutes away from the studios by car.
I speak english, french, and nederlands.

name: converted loft
description:
Please read full desription for how to get there, parking and other details.

The space
Welcome to Ghent...(please click on ¨more¨ for full description of Loft etc)

This is a city and a municipality located in the Flemish region of Belgium.
It is the capital and also the largest city of the East Flanders province.



This is the top floor of a house in the centre of the historical city.
First level of the apartment is a private shower toilet & wardrobe, upstairs there is a kitchenette with fridge, microwave, a 2 ring electrical cooker, we provide tea, milk coffee some eggs, juice, yogurt, bread, cookies etc. There is tv and wifi internet. Of course we provide the needed bedding beds and towels.
I will give you the key on your appointed arrival time.

The flat has a great location: walking a short distance to all the interesting things you will want see in the city.

My wife and I love to welcom
neighborhood_overview: It's close to all that you will want or need visiting our fair city, ie Restaurants Cafes Historic centre Museums etc etc
host_about: We are a couple, living in the historical town Ghent, Belgium. We enjoy seeing new places, discovering local food, etc... We are interested in art, music, in the things that make life beautiful and interesting. We prefer cosiness and true couleur local to luxury. We have a lot of visitors staying from abroad in our own house and appreciate it when they respect the house and the effort of cleaning etc... It speaks for itself that we do the same when travelling. CIAO!

name: Large & bright town House - Center Ghent - max 8p
description:
bright, spacious, authentic & beautifully restaured townhouse in the center of ghent. close to the historical & actual hightlights and most trending places :)
Quiet and creative area, close to small local shops, fresh markets, city supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants, coffee bars, authentic very local pubs. public transport 3' walking distance

The space
This house is available for 2 to 8 people.
Feel free to inform for special rates for 2guests/1 bedroom. you still have access to the entire house, except the 2 bedrooms and bathroom on the third floor.

Restored concierge house build around 1850, with period features such as high ceilings, parquet flooring and marble chimneys. The house is spacious and bright and located in the center of Ghent.

Facilities: Wifi - High speed internet (orange formule LOVE) Grand living room, Fully equipped kitchen.

Ground Floor
Entrance
Hallway with space to store bicycles
neighborhood_overview: our neighbourhood is quiet, but nicely vibrating due to the gentle mix of small local independent shops, restaurants, coffee bars and the best local pubs, but also residents of all ages, and of course our amazing students around :)
host_about:
hi, I'm an interior designer, I live and work in Ghent and I love my city !
I'm renting the house next to mine for short rental stays and would be very happy to help anyone who wants to discover Ghent.
of course travelling & exploring new countries/cities is one of my passions :)

name: Big and bright, design savvy with great views!
description:
We've got a great apartment that we've recently completely refurbished. We're sure you'll feel right at home, just like us. It has lots of plants, vintage, design, bright spaces, books and art.
It's big and the livingroom has sweeping views over the canal. Come and enjoy Ghent from our lovely home.

The space
We've got a great apartment that we've recently completely refurbished. We're sure you'll feel right at home, just like us. It has lots of plants, vintage design, bright spaces, books and art.

The living room is big, bright and comfortable, with lovely views over the canal. There's a flatscreen, sound bar, Netflix and place to lounge, dine and read.

The bedroom has been recently redone and features an king size bed, great artworks and a place to work or get some e-mails done. (new all natural mattresses, blankets and pillows!)

The bathroom may be small, but is clean, modern and comfortable. You'll find clean towels wa
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in a very safe neighborhood.
The neighbourhood is residential and has grocery shops at walking distance.
There is the wonderfull Guislainmuseum in our street. Worth a visit!
host_about:
I am a artist. I've been working full-time on my art since a couple of years. From time to time I teach art handling and art transport to museum professionals.

When I have guest I try to help them as much as I can. I know Ghent from the inside out since I've been living here for over 10 years. I also know the other main cities of Belgium very good and I have a particular good view of all the interesting galleries and Museums in Belgium since I work in that field. 

We are big fans of the outstanding culinary venues in Ghent. We'll glady advise on what restaurants you should go to during your stay. Please feel free to ask me more about myself!

name: Private room in a 19th century house near station.
description:
Only a short walk to the old city center and close to several of Ghent's beautiful parks.

There is parking near the house and bike rental options.

Although the house is located in a very vivid area of town, you can enjoy the peacefulness and quietness at all times as the rooms are located in the back of the house, with a view of the large garden.

Also a little escape to the terrace or the garden are an excellent choice after a busy day of visiting the centre.

The space
I started the renovation of this 19th century house in 2011. Although still ongoing, most works are finished and I am renting out this room, with one double bed. If needed, an extra mattress can be provided so it would fit up to 3 guests. For kids I can put two extra mattresses. We could do this as well for adults but we do not allow party people to stay in the house since some of us are working during the weekends as well, so we prefer quiet guests.

Th
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located between the 'Visserij', 'Macharius' and 'Dampoort' area. Dampoort neighbourhood is known for the its intercultural live and atmosphere. There is a lot of greenery, what you don't often see in the city because Ghent is rated as one of the 'greyest' cities in the world :-). You have at least five small and big parks around the house where you can go to relax or where you have public BBQ sets.

The 'Visserij' and 'Macharius' are mainly populated by young people and young families. There is lots of restaurants and several cozy local bars here.
host_about:
As a freelance journalist and producer mainly in the Middle East, I am often travelling abroad. When I am in Belgian I am living alone in my house in the center of Ghent, with a spare room to rent out to people for short term projects. Besides these projects, the rooms are free for rent to anybody who is willing to visit the beautiful city of Ghent and its surroundings. During my stay abroad, my proper room is available as well. 

After being a host for more then eight years trough several ways, I still love it every day a bit more. Its amazing to host people from all over the world. To help them around if necesary and to give them the space an privacy they need to assure them the most pleasant stay they can imagine. Ghent can be crowded, and so can be the hotels and hostels, therefore I see renting out a part of my private house as a great opportunity for both guest and host.

description:
Large 17th century house with original features on the outskirts of the town of Ghent.

The space
First floor: Spacious livingroom (40m2) + fully equiped kitchen + terrace

Second floor: bedroom (18m2) + bathroom (bath+ showercurtain) / toilet

Guest access
The house is easily reachable with public transport and is at five minutes walking distance from the center. There are many shops, restaurants and pubs in the neighbourhood.

name: Ghent! Need I say more?
description:
The space
My house is in a quiet street but only walking distance from the center of Ghent. Public transport is close by. Check in is flexible, just ask for it when you make your reservation.

You will have a separate room on the secondfloor. I have wireless internet available. I hope you're not allergic to dogs, because I have one little perky Border Collie mut.

The price for one night is about the price for a couple of Irish Coffees per person.
If you like, you can add a tip in my 'tip-can' as I explain in my profile so you can spend what you think it was worth and what you can afford.

Check in on weekdays is between 18 and 20 o'clock and in weekends preferably before 12 o'clock. Feel free to ask for deviations as soon as possible so we can check what suits best for the both of us.

I would like you to follow the house rules: smoking is on the terrace, follow the principle clean as you go (I have a dishwasher) and turn the
host_about:
I'm saving up to travel to the US next spring, the length of the trip will depend on the amount of people staying in my home. 
I'ld like to do part of the 66 and some of the national parcs. 

I'm charging less than a youth hostel for a private room. A 'tip-can' will be in your bed room, so that, if you appreciate your stay, you can add what you can miss or if you like to grab a late night snack or a drink, you can, if you want, add also a coin. Smoking is allowed, but only on the terrace. I have one other house rule: 'What happens in Ghent, stays in Ghent'. 
So, I hope I can welcome you one day at our lovely city and show you around my house, the places to see, ...

Ideal for 1 person or couple. Erasmus or PHD student.
With private kitchen and bathroom (shower, toilet, lavabo). Fully furnished and equipped kitchen.

The space
This is a new self-catered studio in the center of Ghent. Windows in the front and the back.
Fully equipped kitchen with fridge, combi-oven, ceramic hob and coffee machine. The bathroom is equipped with lavabo, toilet and big shower 85 x 120.

Guest access
The studio is on the first floor. There is a bike storage room on the ground floor.

description:
In a very quiet park environment a 50M2 studio with bathroom, bedroom and kichinette. View on a big garden. 2km from railwaystation "Gent Dampoort". Small supermarket, butcher, bakery and Pharmacy in walking distance. Summer swimming pool.

In a very quiet park area a fully equipped 50sqm apartement with livingroom and kitchenette , bathroom and bedroom. Separate private entrance. View on the big garden. description:
The space
Want to stay for a weekend midweek or longer period in one of the most beautiful cities in Belgium ?

We offer you a furnished studio with fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. All this located in a historic building in the heart of the old town.

The studio is ideal for 2 persons, but can also be used for a family with 2 little children (up to 12 years old)

On sunday morning there is a book- and flower market at the end of the street.
host_about: We like to invite open minded people in our accommodations from all over the world to share thoughts. And learn you all about the beautiful unknown spots in our city.

name: Perfect apartment centre of Ghent
description:
We offer you an apartment in the Oude Houtlei 13C. The flat is located in the heart of the old city at 5 minutes walking distance of the Graslei and Korenlei and the Castle Gravensteen but still the location is very quiet.
The apartment is situated in an old schoolbuilding that has recently been renovated with respect for the old details. With its high windows facing south is an oasis of light and space.

The space
We offer you an apartment in the Oude Houtlei. The flat is located in the heart of the old city at 5 minutes walking distance of the Graslei and Korenlei and the Castle Gravensteen but still the location is very quiet. The apartment is situated in an old schoolbuilding and is completely renewed. The decor is tasteful and there is a fully equiped modern kitchen. The apartment provides sleeping accommodation and comfort for two people but for shorter stays it is possible to accomodate one or two children. The price includes bed linen, towels, sheets
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is situated in the heart of the old city, Oude Houtlei Gent. The flat is located at 5 minutes walking distance from the Graslei, Korenlei, the Sint Baafscathedral and the Castle Gravensteen.
There is absolutely everything in the neighborhood at max 5 minutes walking distance : cinema, restaurants, postoffice, shops, supermarket, busstation, public parking, ...

description:
Studiomie One Room Hotel is a creative and unique place to stay in the centre of Ghent.
You sleep in a refined furnished sea container high above the ground.
This place exudes design, culture and styling. All your senses are tickled.
Here you feel like experiencing more, .... more Ghent.

Mieke, Ward, Warre and Roos wish you a warm welcome!

The space
Room with a view
Sleep container with a King-sized bed of 2/2m and Egyptian cotton bedlinen / bathroom with shower, bath towels, toilet, hairdryer and Likami bath products / breakfast area with Nespresso coffee, tea, water,
fridge / sunny terrace / free WI-FI / TV
​
Breakfast
We recommend Franz Gustav, a place for a delicious breakfast in our street.
Prefer to have breakfast in your pyjamas? Bring your own breakfast and keep it fresh in the fridge. The room has a nice crockery set, a toaster, Nespresso coffee and tea.
​

name: Large airy studio, central location
description:
Central though quiet location. Spacious studio on upperfloor. Nice view from kitchen onto garden and park.Historical centre just round the corner.

The space
The studio consists of two large airy , bright rooms on the topfloor of our house.
The kitchen-dining area overlooks our garden and the adjoining park. Next to it is a (to be fair) small bathroom with shower. The bedroom is on the streetside. It is very spacious. There s a foldable guestbed in case of three persons.
There is television, a desk and free Wifi.
Towels and bedlinnen are provided. Breakfast on demand. Free tea and coffee. We also provide guides and maps to the city.
The studio is located in a quiet street near the city centre. The castle is a five minute walk. The studio is two flights of stairs up but we ll insist and carry your luggage upstairs. All part of the service.
Fresh Fruit , bottled water and local beers are offered as a warm welcome.
Free coffee & tea.
neighborhood_overview:
The old city quarters 'Patershol' is just round the corner. It is a maze of small pedestrian Streets filled with good restaurants.
The neighbourhood we live in is called Prinsenhof and it was all part of the domain of Charles V. Some remnants can be spotted.
host_about:
We love and live in Ghent. Travelling, movies , english literature and nights on the town are my passions but most of all my dog Pablo : light of my life.
I love to cook mediterranean style greatly inspired by Jamie Oliver, Nigella Lawson and Ottolenghi.
-Better to be fooled than to be suspicious all the time- E.M. Forster

Spacious room with double bed under the stars, between the clouds.

Luxurious marble bathroom with bath and shower.

Cozy kitchen overlooking the courtyard equipped with oven, stove, fridge and freezer.

Living room with comfortable sofas, stereo and plenty of reading material.

Sunny terrace with dining table, 2 hammocks

All this in a minute walk from the 'Gravensteen' castle and the Graslei.
Near 'Prinsenhof' lays 'Patershol', a neighborhood known for its many restaurants, cafes and pi
neighborhood_overview:
The house is located in the historic center of Ghent, where the birds eagerly whistle, the children are playing in the street, the neighbours know each other by name and cars are endangered species.
All this in a minute walk from the 'Gravensteen' castle and the Graslei.
Near 'Prinsenhof' lays 'Patershol', a neighborhood known for its many restaurants, cafes and picturesque alleys.

At 10 minutes walking you stand at the 'vlas' market, the 'place to be to take a step into the nightlife of Ghent. During the Ghent Festival is this the place where the locals feast until the early hours.

name: Stylish and comfortable apartment downtown Ghent
description:
Modern, cosy and stylishly equipped flat with all comforts and kitchen. Located in a quiet and pleasant neighbourhood. Park your car right outside the door while being perfectly located to the bustling city centre.
Feel free to move from your new base with our two bikes. This way you will not only discover the idyllic spots in the suburbs but also the nearby nature.

The space
Very clean, modern and stylish flat perfect for a comfortable stay in the city.

Make yourself comfortable in the warmly decorated living room. Adjust the mood light to your liking and watch from your lazy sofa your favourite programmes on TV with free selection of movies. Stay in touch with home via the free Wi-Fi and high-speed internet or play a board games or browse the bookshelves.

Feel right at home in the fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, oven, microwave, fridge with freezer, Senseo coffee machine, kettle, toaster...
Upon arrival you will find a bo
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the centre of Ghent in an easily accessible area near the Zuidpark. Ideal for a short or long stay in this beautiful city.

Within walking distance of all major attractions and a 10-minute walk from the bustling city centre. If you prefer public transport, all major bus and tram connections are within 100 metres walking distance.

Ghent is a beautiful historical city with cosy neighbourhoods, picturesque buildings along squares and rivers and lovely parks. In our city, which you cross in an hour's walk, you will also find many shops and boutiques, musea, eateries, restaurants, cafés and dance halls.

Ghent's central location is also an ideal base for visiting other cities such as Bruges, Brussels and Antwerp or even Lille in France. All can be reached within 40 minutes by train or car. Even the international airport of Brussels is an hour away by car, taxi or train.
host_about:
I'm an open minded, very busy entrepreneur who like to make things convenient for other people.

I'm curious about other cultures, I love to travel to Thailand.

Before I was a real party animal, nowadays I'm more into dining and wining with friends or easy at home.

My favorite seven lovely logics:

1. Make Peace with your Past so it doesn’t spoil your Present.
2. What others Think of you is None of your Business.
3. Time Heals Almost Everything, Give the Time, Some Time.
4. No one is the Reason of your Happiness Except You yourself.
5. Don’t compare your Life with others, You have No Idea what their journey is all about.
6. Stop Thinking too much, It’s alright not to know all the Answers.
7. Smile, you don’t own all the Problems in the World.

name: Big & cosy riverside apartment
description:
Quiet and yet in walking distance from the city center. Comfortable space for 1 to 4 people. Your kitchen, living room and bathroom. Supermarkts, restaurants, park, museums around the corner. Welcome! :-)

The space
You want to know if this apartment is clean, safe, cozy, roomy, friendly, and conveniently located, right? The answer is yes, to all of that!

In a nutshell:
------------------
- complete appartment with kitchen and garden
- riverside location, quiet area
- historic city center at 2km (nice walk!)
- also in walking distance: supermarkets, train station, bus station, park, college & university
- free wifi
- friendly and helpful hosts ;-)
- we give 10% of our income from airbnb to an organisation that cares and finds new homes for abandoned and lost cats
- animal friendly

Some highlights:

- great location in Ghent, at 2 km (20 min. walk) from the city centre. Short walk to bus
neighborhood_overview:
Great location in Ghent, in the so called "art district", at a 15 min. walk from the city centre. Short walk to bus stop, the congress center, musea, park, movie theatre. Also close to the highway entrance.
Twenty min. walk from the train station.
host_about:
I'm a 41 year old woman, living together with my boyfriend Tobias, our two dogs (Podencos) and many cats (five permanent felines, others in temporary fostering). I love cooking (vegetarian/vegan food), gardening, reading, and watching TV-series like Dexter, Breaking Bad or Downtown Abbey. Me and my boyfriend both work in Ghent, in a non profit organisation
We love opening our home to guests and help them to have as enjoyable a stay as possible. We also love Ghent, our town. It is neither too big or too small, and has been ranked as the third most authentic city in the world by National Geographic. We're sure you'll love it too. 
As for travelling, I've seen several Africa countries, have travelled in Thailand and India, and during the last few years me and my boyfriend have really loved our road trips in the USA.

Etienne and I live in the city centre of Ghent, in an old monastry. From our house it's only 10 minutes walking to the old center or the St-Baafscathedral, one of the famous 3 towers of Ghent.
Ghent has a central location in Flanders. Antwerp and Brussels at 50 km and Bruges at 30 km. All cities are easy to reach by train.

We love traveling around, which is reflec

name: Heaven@11, your charming studio in historic Gent.
description:
A white house on a quiet street in a medieval quarter, Number 11 offers private accommodation in the fascinating historical town of Gent. Two self-contained units* - '11 Apa Above' and '11 Studio below' - can be booked together or separately. Your studio is on the ground floor.

The space
Prefer your own independent place in town?

Come and stay with us : we offer you a charming studio with bedroom, bathroom, kitchenette & small patio on the ground floor of a 18th century house, right in the middle of Gent's historic center of 'Patershol' : an exciting and cosy neighbourhood, little alleys, medieval streets and castle, a choice of 250 kinds of beer, surprising cultural walks, unique restaurants, sauna and a nightshop, all just next door.

More info : Lonely Planet Belgium and Luxembourg June 2010 - pag 166

Guest access
The studio is on the ground floor and completely individual.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview:
Located right in the middle of Gent's historic center of 'Patershol' : an exciting and cosy neighbourhood, little alleys, medieval streets and castle.

The Patershol quarter is the medieval heart of the city. The Friary of the Calced Carmelites, dating back to 1329, was fully restored at the end of the last century and reopened as an exhibion space. Thirty years ago, you could buy a little house here for next to nothing. Today, the Patershol is one of the city’s most desirable neighbourhoods. For good dining, you can choose from one of the many restaurants which have sprung up in the medieval alleys. From Japanese to Thai, to delicious traditional Flemish cooking, you’ll find everything here. - See more at: http://www.visitgent.be/en/patershol?context=tourist#sthash.qkx4eI46.dpuf
host_about:
P Roelens, interior architect.
K Vandekerkhove, visual communication

name: Beautiful calm room in centre of Ghent/Gent
description:
I love the impossible carpet in the room. It was a challenge to elevate the room to a space where you can come and relax and use as a 'basecamp' to explore the city. Upcycled furniture, design and some homemade original photography make this a beautiful room for a couple of days.

For cycling fans; you can leave your city bike safely away from the street, locked in the back of the building, for fans of Ronde Van Vlaanderen, leave them overnight safely next to your room in the apartment.
Welcome

The space
I can accommodate one or two people that want to visit the beautiful vibrant and -at the same time- historic city of Ghent. My apartment has a spacious extra bedroom and is fully furnished in an unique way, you will see when you come and spent some time here.
It is situated in the Centre of the City of Ghent. the city centre and its major attractions can all be reached by foot in ten to 15 minutes. The apartment is easily reachable from trai
neighborhood_overview: The place is unique because it is in Ghent. In between Sint Anna square and the Vlasmarkt you can feel that the 'hood' is vibrating with change. Kobe Desramaults just started his new restaurant 'Chambre Séparée' at my doorstep. the scenic port of Portus Ganda IS my backyard. The mystic ruins of Sint Baafs are just at the other side of the river. Nightlife is abundant and at the end of my street (Vlasmarkt/Sint Jacobs/Beestenmarkt/Hoogpoort...).
host_about:
hey I am Barnabé, a few years ago I bought this place. After some major renovations it was all up to my liking. For a couple of years I had a roommate. Now he left for new adventures. I redesigned the room that I have for rent with some fresh touches and upcycled furniture so that I can share my space with my guests. I really recommend a visit tho the beautiful historic and vibrant city of Ghent. 

Be welcome!!!

name: Beautiful Park View
description:
The bedroom has a view over the park. There is a lovely and quiet atmosphere in the house. The house is located 15 minutes from the city centre and 8 minutes away from Station Dampoort.

The space
Out of the guest room you can look to the parc, the trees and hear the birds singing. The room is under the rooftop and is 36 square metres big. You can find your total privacy in the room. There is a small sitting place, you can make coffee, tea and your own breakfast. You also have your own private bathroom. So when you are in the room you can cocoon.

Guest access
The room is totally and only available for the guests. In summertime they can make use of the garden and the park to make a nice walk.

The house is situated 10 minutes by bus from the city centre.

name: Private floor with bedroom, bathroom and living
description:
Located in a very calm street, at about 2 km from the town centre, on feet 25 minutes walking
Transport to city centre: by bus #3 or #6 in 15 minutes, by bicycle in 10 minutes
Close to the river Scheldt perfect to enjoy biking
Excellent connections (bus, train, car) to visit the Flemish art cities Bruges, Antwerp, Brussels
No kitchen, no breakfast, but many options available
Registered listing

The space
The house is built in 1932 in a local art deco style, with balcony and garden.
The guest room is located on the first floor and consists of a bedroom with a small living and bathroom, with washstand, shower and toilet.

Guest access
Guests will have exclusive access to the complete first floor.

Other things to note
No kitchen, no fridge, no breakfast, cooking not allowed.
We will be there most of the time, whatever yo need to know, please ask us.
neighborhood_overview:
Child friendly street, with big linden trees.
River Scheldt closely.
Parking in Ghent is payable at 3€ /day.
Most of the stores close on sundays.
host_about: We are from Belgium, I'm an  IT specialist and my wife is very specialized in Spanish American literature. We like traveling as we are very interested in culture (literature, history, opera, classic music) and nature (hiking, cycling, mountains). We both speak dutch, english, french, spanish and a bit german.

name: band resort 0.1
description:
Our apartment on Belfortstreet is located on the corner of Vlasmarkt, right next to Sint Jacobs which puts in right in the middle of the of vibrant, historic Ghent. At walking distance of Gent Dampoort train station, close to all tourist attractions, bike rental and with a very good connection to public transport. Hungry of thirsty? You will not have to go searching far. The apartment has all modern comfort: free WiFi and cable television, a fully equipped kitchen.

The space
Band Resort is a recently renovated apartment in a residential building (respect for the neighbors is a must). Maximum occupancy is 9 adults (incl sofas in living room). There are two bedrooms with a double bed, one room with a double and a single bed and two extra sofa beds in the living room. On top of that you have a fully functional kitchen, a large dining table and TV corner, two separate bathrooms with toilet, washbasin and shower, free WiFi and cable television. The windows have ac
neighborhood_overview: No shortage of markets and entertainment in the vibrant city centre. Each Friday till Sunday Prondelmarkt (flea market) at Sint Jacobs, flowers on the Kouter, delicious food on Vrijdagsmarkt,… Restaurants and snacks galore, shops and boutiques every where you look! Searching for a nice city walk? visit.gent.be A selection of our favorite wining and dining spots, a city map and other tourist information will be in the information folder in the apartment.

The area is multicultural and often called the Brooklyn of Ghent, especially young and creative talent has recently moved to this part of town. There is a supermarket, postpoint, bakery, pharmacy, restaurants, grocery and news agents just around the corner. You can relax in the enclosed private garden or at different parks and the nearby waterfront. This house includes one parkingspace in our private garage.

name: unique loftspace with garden
description:
The space
Beautiful loft in the city centre, located 200m from train station, this is a perfect place to be comfortable and explore the city on foot. Master and three kids rooms, open fireplace, a private courtyard,and a big bath, you're bound to relax.

Our artist loft is part of a charming and communal project with a shared spacious garden for the community. The loft is an architectural beauty which has been published in Architectural Yearbook Flanders. It has it’s own private courtyard. It is a refurbished warehouse and other units are occupied by architects and designers. It is a great place to live. It is ideal for a family with young children. Ours are 14, 8 and 6 years old.

All facilities of the house can be used. There is wifi, television and a sonos system.

It is a multi-cultural neighborhood in the city centre - so, if you're looking for it, there is a lot to do.

description:
My apartment is situated very close to the heart of the city, on the second floor of a 4-store building. There are 2 bedrooms with in each a double bed, basic bathroom with toilet and shower, fully equipped kitchen, sunny living room, small terrace overlooking peaceful gardens. NO ELEVATOR! Central heating in every room, wifi, washing machine, television, DVD-player, CD- and recordplayer; cd's and lp's to listen to, lots of books. Nothing fancy, but clean, practical and cosy.

quiet little terrace on the back (south side) suitable for 2 persons

surface: 80 m² -

name: CLEAR AND LIGHTFULL APARTMENT CENTRE OF GHENT
description:
We offer you an apartment in the Oude Houtlei 13C. The flat is located in the heart of the old city at 5 minutes walking distance of the Graslei and Korenlei and the Castle Gravensteen but still the location is very quiet.
The apartment is situated in an old schoolbuilding that has recently been renovated with respect for the old details. With its high windows facing south is an oasis of light and space.

The space
The apartment is situated in an old schoolbuilding and is completely renewed. The decor is tasteful and there is a fully equiped modern kitchen with washingmachine, dryingmachine and dishwasher. The apartment provides accommodation and comfort for two people but for shorter stays it is possible to accomodate one or two children. The price includes bed linen, towels, sheets, internet connection, digital television and a weekly cleaning service. For every stay there is a welcome packet of food provided but no breakfast.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in the heart of the old city, Oude Houtlei Gent.  The flat is located at 5 minutes walking distance from the Graslei, Korenlei, the Sint Baafscathedral and the Castle Gravensteen. There is absolutely everything in the neighborhood at max 5 minutes walking distance : cinema, restaurants, postoffice, shops, supermarket, busstation, public parking, ...

name: Sunny duplex, small and all-in loft studio
description:
Welcome in our small but cosy studio situated on the top of our house! Sarah, Henna and I live right between the train station and city center. With a spacious shower, cosy living-room, well equipped kitchen and comfortable mezzanine you will feel like home. Sharing in common only the main door and stairs, you remain completely independent. Helping you with music, books, info about Ghent and instant conversation, we want you to feel at home. There is good parking possibility at 800m (3 €/day).

The space
This studio is located in a typical middle class house of Gent. On top of the house, a small loft studio is waiting for new Airbnb-guests! I have renovated it with help of my friends from Moupila (architecture and design) and some other professionals. It has definitely become the best place of the house and it has character and an original style. Regularly, I add something or try to improve it. The ground-surface is only 40m2 but it feels big because the bedroom
neighborhood_overview: My house is next to the 'Kortrijkse-steenweg'. This is an important and very known street and axis because it relies the railwaystation (St-Pieters) to the center of the city. So, there is a tram-stop at 50 m of my house, where you can take tram n°1 direct to the historical center. The 'Citadelpark' is the biggest park in town, only 250m of my house. And not so for away is sport and green area center 'Blaarmeersen' and 'Watersportbaan'. In resume: a very good location and starting point to discover Gent.
host_about: I live in Gent since I was studying for Bio-engineer. Now, my wife Sarah and our little baby live with me in 'Our house in the middle of the street'. I worked first as development agent for a Belgian NGO in drinking water projects, especially in Africa. Now I work as a teacher of sciences, math and/or geography. Apart from treeclimbing, I don't have any other specific hobbies as such, but I have lots of interests, to discover the world, people, nature and to learn how to live this life! I like biking, talking & walking, water & forests, mountains & trees, music & movies and my ambitions are green & peaceful! Everything you give or do for others, someday you will be rewarded for that. Do ut des.

description:
We offer in the Middle of Ghent a very spacious
and fully equipped apartment (45m²) located on the 2nd floor of a renovated 19th century neoclassical mansion.

Enjoy all modern confort including a luxurious private bathroom/shower, fridge and microwave, digital TV, Free Wireless Broadband Internet in a very spacious and very quiet setting in the very heart of the city. name: Small loft + private bathroom
description:
We offer a back house with studio, private toilet and private bathroom. All newly installed, well isolated and very private. Connected with main house through a veranda which you can use to relax, our back-house is ideal for short and mid-term stays. Leave your car and hop on the tram (at 100m) or walk to discover an alternative Ghent.

The space
The (your) back house is connected (by your veranda and private toilet) with the (our) main house but stands alone, making it isolated and very private. Enjoy the private new bathroom with 2p bath on ground level and the studio on the 1st floor. Through the veranda you have access to your private toilet. We can add a matress/bed for 1 child/baby.

Guest access
Loft has free Wifi, small hifi with minijack, HD cable TV and personal fridge. You do not have a kitchen but feel free to use our kitchen to heat a meal. We provide basic dishes and cutlery which you can put in our dishwasher.
All inside
neighborhood_overview:
Ledeberg is a lively part of Ghent (though our street is very peaceful). It offers fast access to the city centre, swift connections to public transport and bycicle-lanes. Think of us as being a comfortable hub to a great city. Also enjoy our Sundaymorning market and take advantage of the many shops, Belgian fries, take-aways (Thai, Vietnamese, Chinese, Turkish) & small restaurants. Excvellent 'Delhaize' supermarket at 100 m. Explore alternative walks to Ghent city centre & discover wonderful sites & sights.

Prepare your visit to Ghent, check the official City website (also in EN) "visit gent".
host_about:
Me, my wife and our 10yo daughter enjoy the company of travelers.
Having traveled around the globe we understand your needs and we are glad to help you, in the first place by offering a warm, clean and comfortable stay.
We know and understand the artistic, progressive and alternative aspects of Ghent from the inside and are glad to introduce you or put you on your way to explore.

name: Modern flat 2 bedr close to  center
description:
Our recently renovated 2 bedroom apartment is at walking distance from Ghent center. Free wifi, living room with sofabed and comfortable boxspring beds in the bedrooms. Close to public transport and within one hour drive from Bruges, Antwerp and Brussels.

The space
The apartment has a well equipped kitchen (with microwave, oven, stove, dishwasher), two bedrooms with boxspring beds and a bathroom. Children are welcome. On request, we provide a cot and high chair.

Guest access
We only accept reservations for a minimum of three nights.
We ask the customers the expected arrival time and ask them to call half an hour before they actually arrive, so we can be there upon their arrival.
For arrivals after 9PM, we provide a code to the keybox, and agree on a timing to pass by the next day.

Other things to note
Tourist tax of 2,83 euro per adult per night charged seperately
Bed linen is included, towels are not.
neighborhood_overview: Close to center of Ghent, in quiet neighbourhood
host_about:
Love to travel myself and also love the city I live in. So came the idea to rent vacation homes so other people could enjoy my city as well :). 
We are do not live in our  vacation homes,  but like to receive you personnaly and give explanation about our place and the city.  During your stay, you can always contact us by phone or email for any questions or problems.  If necessary, we will come over. Do not hesitate to contact us, we want you to feel as comfortable as  at home!

name: Lounge in the Intimate Urban Garden at a Retro Getaway
description: Explore the nearby design museum, then take it easy at this breezy, open-concept retreat looking out into the courtyard garden. Vintage wooden furniture makes for mid-century style and a warm ambiance, while white decor keeps things fresh.
neighborhood_overview: The house is situated in a residential area in the heart of old Ghent with its wonderful old buildings and museums. The Counts Castle is a 5-minute walk away and the famous medieval neighborhood of Patershol has lots of restaurants to explore.
host_about:
Hello, I m Nina. I have a cute family: Jan, my husband, our two daughters and our son.
We are designers who love to gather nice things around us. We also love visiting flea markets and looking for treasures.
Living in the center of Ghent and being surrounded by all those nice old buildings is amazing! Its such a privilege to live close to our friends and family. 
Ghent has been ranked as the third most authentic city in the world by National Geographic. We're sure you'll love it too.

name: Cute House at 7km from Ghent center
description:
This spacious house has 3 BR and 1,5 bathrooms. Seperate well equipped kitchen. One bathroom with rainshower and seperate toilet. One of the bedrooms has a double sink and there is an additional toilet on the first floor. Nice garden with terrace. Ghent center within 15minutes, and within one hour drive to all other major Flemish towns (Antwerp, Brussels, Brugge, Ypres). Also the nice historical town Lille in France is at one hour drive.

The space
House of Choice: the choice of many towns to visit while staying at a relaxing quiet house. At 11 minutes drive from historical center of Ghent and close to highway giving access within the hour to Brussels, Antwerp, Bruges, Ostend, Ypres (know for being a WWI battle front, with very nice museum and Flanders Fields) and Lille (France).

Guest access

name: Cosy, sunny and spacious house with city garden
description:
Big house with city garden, sleeps 6-8 adults (and some babies).
Public transport with direct connections towards train station and historical centre around the corner.
2 bicycles and baby chart available
Child friendly
Wifi
Near sunday market
Affordable parking options

The space
The house is from the 19th century but recently renovated. All rooms are very spacious.

On the ground level the dining/living area. The open kitchen had induction, classic oven, dish washer, nespresso machine and Senseo (pads not included) microwave, steam oven. From the kitchen you have a view towards the garden. The living room has a seating area and a big design table. Polyurethane flour and flour heating. In summer time you can use the barbecue and garden table and chairs.

You can use the sonos sound system and the led-tv. Wifi in the whole house.

Under the roof the master bedroom with ensuite bathroom With toilet, 2 si
neighborhood_overview: Ledeberg is a lively area. You can enjoy the local sunday market around the corner. Bakeries, groceries, restaurants,..., all within walking distance. We can direct you to our favourite places. There are also good take-away places (Thai, Vietnamese, Italian, pita, fries) in the neighbourhood. However, you are not in the historic city centre, you are in a safe suburb with excellent connections towards the historic centre.
host_about: I'm a history and art teacher living in Gent - Ledeberg, very close to the historical center. I have a wife and a 2 cute sons.

name: HOME: Cosy Modern Flat  - Free parking until 31/07
description:
My very cosy 1 bedroom flat is 60m² and fully equiped. It is located near the historic center of Ghent (15min on foot, ~1km). It is a modern place (2010). The cat on the pics passed away in 2017 unfortunately, so no pets live here.

THE FREE PARKING IS GUARANTEED UNTIL THE END OF THE JULY
After that, I'm not sure I can still rent it.
Streetparking @3€/day.

PLEASE REGISTER YOUR CAR BECAUSE OF THE LOW EMISSION ZONE IN GHENT!!! Otherwise 150€ fine.
https://lez.stad.gent/en/flows/controleertoegang

The space
My apartment is on the first floor of a modern building (2010).
The apartement is 60m².

There is a large elevator.

Inside you have the Living room / Kitchen. This space is L-shaped.
There is a TV with cable.
There also is a small balcony if you would like to step outside to smoke for example.

In the kitchen there is a door to the storage room, there you'll find the microwave.
neighborhood_overview:
I live in a calm neighbourhood in a dead-end street, around 1km from the old town. Easily walkable or reachable by public transport.
Small stores (food etc) are superclose, take-away places and night shops as well. At a few 100m you'll find a huge supermarket.
There's a park at about 200m.
host_about:
I love to travel and I love to host..! 
Before, during and after this Covid-19 crisis, the apartment was, is  and always will be thoroughly cleaned!
Checkin and checkout times have been changed in order to guarantee at least 3hours between guests, which is recommended.

name: Ingericht appartement aan de rand van de stad
description:
Deze ingerichte gezellige appartementen voor kort of lang verblijf bieden een uniek alternatief voor de hotels in Gent.

Elk appartement heeft zijn eigen badkamer en prima uitgeruste keuken.

Start de dag met een regendouche en een kopje koffie of wil je in de tuin werken op de laptop? Het is zalig verblijven in midiSud…

Binnen mag niet worden gerookt. Huisdieren zijn toegelaten op aanvraag

The space
Atlantic bevindt zich op de eerste verdieping en is een loft met een geïntegreerde goed uitgeruste keuken, leefkamer en slaapkamer. De badkamer heeft een douchecabine met regendouche.

Twee kinderen kunnen in een comfortabele slaapzetel logeren (suppl.).
neighborhood_overview:
Centraal gelegen op een boogscheut van de snelwegen E17 en E40, dichtbij het Zuidpark, op wandelafstand van de kantoren Zuiderpoort, restaurants, bioscoop en musea. Met de tram ben je zo in het historisch centrum van Gent.

In een straal van 2 km vind je het SMAK, MSK, ICC, Flanders Expo, Decascoop Kinepolis, Vooruit, het Universitair Ziekenhuis en alle evenementen in het centrum van Gent (Filmfestival, Festival van Vlaanderen, Gent Jazz, enz.)

name: Entrée d'Artistes@Historical Ghent-Centre
description:
L'entrée d'artistes@historical Ghent is a very popular compact, small, sunny room provided with all the facilities.On 7'walk from the Graslei,Castle provided with microwave/fridge/priv.bathroom/towels/bedding/bathrobes/hairdryer/coiffée,thee,milk( incl) Breakfast possibilities in the Patershol, Veerleplein, Sluizeken, Sleepstraat. Common main entrance.

The space
"L'entrée des artistes » is a self contained compact little room, located in the centre of Ghent, with breakfast options* The room is not big, but everything you need is there. (see description lower) The house is located on the historical Fratersplein, with the statue of Pedro de Gante en opposite the house, the Carthusian monastery where the Treaty of Ghent was signed in 1814. It's 100-600m away from the Patershol, Graslei, shoppingstreet
etc. We choosed for a brand new transformable seatbed with a very good mattress equal quality as a bed, confirmed by the guests. The seatbed gives the possibilit
neighborhood_overview:
Centre of Ghent: one of the most beautiful places to be.
A very lively area in the centre of Ghent, 100-600m away from the Patershol, the shoppingstreet Lange Munt, all historical attraction such as the Gravensteen, Vrijdagsmarkt, Graslei, Korenmarkt, etc. etc.. In the immediate vicinity are several stores and bakeries as well as the numerous wonderful restaurants in the famous Patershol, the Turkish, Italian restaurants in the Sleepstraat, the wonderful restaurants on the Graslei, breakfast possibilities all only 5 minutes walking.
The shoppingstreet Lange Munt is also only 5 minutes walking. In short, the ideal location for a nice stay in the centre of beautiful Ghent.
host_about: U komt bij ons terecht in een creatief en muzikaal huis. Ik ben een gepassioneerde en gedreven violiste met heel wat eigen solistische en kamermuzische projecten naast mijn vaste plaats in de Opera.  Mijn hobby is mijn beroep en mijn beroep mijn hobby. Sinds 2019 studeer ik er nog een Bachelor Jazz bij. Naast muziek hou ik van alle vormen van kunst alsook de kunst van het leven zelf. Mijn twee zonen, (de ene zoon werkt aan een Phd en de andere zoon maakt deel uit van een zelfstandig verpleegkundig team), zijn beiden ook muzikaal begaafd, zij spelen gitaar en piano. In december trouwde ik voor de tweede maal met een topman. Hij werkt in het staf team van Stad Gent, departement opvoeding, jeugd en onderwijs. Hij heeft een passie voor lekkere wijn, creatief koken, reizen en het is zalig leven met hem. Vijf dingen waar ik niet buiten kan: mijn kinderen, mijn man, familie, ouders, mijn viool, muziek in het algemeen, mijn huis dat volledig verbouwd is naar eigen smaak en onze "tempel" is waar we ons gelukkig voelen, mijn vrienden en sociale contacten, mijn computer. Mijn favoriete reisbestemmingen zijn  Schotland, Zwitserland, Frankrijk, Engeland, Zuid-Korea, Tenerife, Spanje. Ik hou van boeken over psychologie, boeken over muziek en kunst. Favoriete films zijn alle films van Lars von Trier, Andrej Tarkovski, "de andere film" in het algemeen, maar ik hou ook van James Bond films en "gemakkelijkere" films. Ik hou van Koreaans eten, van de Franse keuken, Italiaanse keuken, de goeie Belgische keuken en van alle lekkere gerechten die met liefde klaargemaakt zijn.

name: Marcel de Gand Business & Travel Flats II
description:
Hippe, ruime kamers met hedendaags design en alle comfort aan een karaktervol huis met een unieke locatie op 10 min van het historisch centrum van Gent en rustig gelegen aan de rand van het natuurreservaat. Gent vlot bereikbaar met de fiets, bus of wagen!
In alle rust tot jezelf komen... of de bruisende stad intrekken, de keuze is aan jou.

The space
De ruime kamer heeft een super King Size bed van 180 x 210 cm (2 x 90 x 210 cm).
Aparte privé badkamer met ligbad/douche.
Een handige kitchenette met gootsteen, microgolf, thee- en Nespresso faciliteiten en een mini-bar.
Een privé terras met tuinmeubels en parasol met uitkijk op de tuin.

Guest access
Eenvoudige en flexibele check-in.
neighborhood_overview:
Je kan van een ontspannende wandeling genieten in het naast gelegen natuurreservaat Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen. Op 10 insta je in het bruisende centrum van Gent.
Flanders Expo is met de wagen op 15 min bereikbaar. Vlot openbaar vervoer naar de stad en de twee treinstations Gent Sint Pieters en Gent Dampoort.
host_about: Ik ben Sandra. Ik geef les in interieurvormgeving aan de School of Arts in Gent. Ik ben  zeer geïnteresseerd in kunsten, design, architectuur,… en cultuur. Mijn man en ik  kennen onze stad door en door en kunnen onze gasten dan ook zeer gericht adviseren indien gevraagd. Samen hebben wij ook B&B Marcel de Gand opgericht waarin al onze passies samenkomen: mensen ontmoeten, gasten ontvangen, genieten van architectuur en interieurvormgeving, koken, delen,…

name: SINT-IVO  Deluxe Appartement
description:
A beautiful house in the historical hart of Ghent! Sint-Ivo is located in one of the top residential neighbourhoods of Ghent: the cosy, peaceful prinsenhof with it's beautiful oak trees and the lively vibrating city just one streetcorner away!

The space
Sint-Ivo is a 3 level house. -1: bathroom, 0: entrance hall, +1: 2 bedrooms, +2: living room, dining area, kitchen and buro. There are about ten to twelve steps between every floor. So very small staircases. :)

Guest access
The whole house is yours! :)
And the neighbors are sweet enough to let you park your bikes in their storage room…and NO, you are not allowed to use their garden!

Other things to note
The city of Ghent asks a tourist tax of 3 euro per night per person. The tourist tax is not included in the price listed on airbnb! This tax has to be paid cash on site.
neighborhood_overview:
Walk 1 min to the right and see the beautiful river Lieve with all the willow trees. Walk 3 min to the left and see the impressive medieval Castle Gravensteen.

This really is a triple A location! Enjoy!

ps don't forget to walk 5 min further to the groentenmarkt and try the typical gent sweets called Cuberdons!
host_about:
Hey! 

I'm Barbara, a 40 year old local Ghentian crazy about chocolate and pilates! Friends describe me as 'Audrey Hepburn meets bubblegum'! I kinda think this explains it all! ;) 

I host a beautiful house called Sint-Ivo in the historical city center of Ghent. 

The house dates from the 14th century. It was originally called 'The Cogghe' - a referral to the ships that cruised the river. In 1748 the lawyers association together with doorkeepers and prosecutors settled into the house and named it Saint Ivo - lawyer of the poor in the 13th century. 

Barbara

name: Home Trietje 1 **
description:
A three bedroom house for family/group in Ghent with free parking and free wifi. The guests can enjoy the whole house without having to share it to anyone else

The space
Mission of Home Trietje: Good relationship is the most important in life. Home Trietje exists to serve as a place for families/friends or colleagues to share nice moments together.

We are happy when our guests are happy. That is why we do our best to keep the place at an affordable price and to make our guests feel comfortable like at home.


We offer you:
- An honest service based on trust
- Free parking in front of the door.
- Free WIFI.
- A standard and comfortable accommodation (Home Trietje passes strict rules of the Belgian authorities. There is no difference between Home Trietje and a two star hotel in terms of safety, hygiene and comfort).
-A calm place in centre of Mariakerke, not far from Ghent centre.
- Group
neighborhood_overview:
-The house is very close to the supermarkets (open until 8:00 pm),
backery, doctor, farmacy, public transport (buses) which leads you
easily to the Historical center of Ghent (3 km)
-Ideal for walking and biking and for persons who love the nature (0 5km to the natural reservation park Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen; 1 km castle park 'Claeys-Bouüaert ', and amusement park-Park Kaffee; 0 2 km' Bruges canal - Bruges canal ', etc.
-The house locates in a convenient location directing to Bruges (50km by car) or 38km by bike along the beautiful Canal route for cyclists.
-You may also want to explore the neighborhood within a short walking distance from the house such as the historic Western Cemetery (Westerbegraafplaats); Onze-Lieve-Vrouw geboortekerk (Mariakerke); Kasteel Claeys-Bouüaert; Kasteel La Maison Blanche; Kasteel Les Fougères of Les Cygnes; Kollekasteel, etc.
The museum MIAT specialized in industry, labour and textiles is about 3.9km from the house.
host_about:
Mission of Home Trietje:
Good relationship is the most important in life. Home Trietje is operated to serve as a place for families/friends or colleagues to share nice moments together. 
I am happy when my guests are happy. That is why I do my best to keep the place at an affordable price and to make my guests feel comfortable like at home:
-The house locates in a calm area but not far from Gent centre. 
- This is a simple but comfortable accommodation 
Home Trietje passes strict rules of the Belgian authorities. So, there is no difference between Home Trietje and a two star hotel in terms of safety, hygiene and comfort. 
-The privacy of my guests are respected (guests don’t have to share the house with anyone). 
- There is no reception desk; no one bothers my guests.  The door is accessible via self check-in with code but I am available  if needed either to solve any issue/problem occurred or my guests just feel a need to meet me in person

name: Apartment: 20% off (scaffold in front of terras)
description:
Nice apartment, less than 2 km from the historical center of Ghent. Superb view (sunset!) from the 12th floor (one of the highest of Ghent).
Free parking (which is very rare in Ghent).
Direct access from/to the motorways avoiding the city traffic jams and anyhow very quiet.
Old fashioned 70-ties apartment with spacious living room with parquet floor and separate income and kitchen.

The space
Enjoy the sunny view on the city of Ghent.

There is a spacious living room with a sofa, unfolding in a double bed, sitting corner and a dining area (table and chairs). The fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher, oven, microwave, expresso machine, toaster, water cooker) and the bathroom (with washing machine) are separate and of course there are the sunny terrace (10.5 by 1.3m) and the great view (although we cannot guarantee the sun). Currently however, the terrace is hardly useable due to the scaffold (smoking a sigaret on it is still possible).
neighborhood_overview:
'Ghent is like Bruges, but alive'.
Check the the blog: "Who knew Ghent, Belgium was the prettiest city in the world?" on Americablog, from its founder John Aravosis. I couldn't describe it better.
The apartment was in the seventies the first breakout from the city center for middle class people. Still close to the center, but also close to highway exit (which was an asset at that time). The apartment is at the sunny backside. No annoyance from the main road at the front side and a wonderful view on the sunset.
There is a supermarket and a 'suburb center' at 500m.
host_about:
We are a Belgian couple that likes traveling, meeting new people. We love to share our apartment with airbnb. 
During our travels we emphasize on 'experiencing' rather than on 'visiting'.
We appreciate authenticity.

name: 'The Crown' App 2p, free CoffeeHouse Breakfast
description:
This is a newly renovated corner apartment in the historic centre of Ghent. The spacious two floor app with tons of light is situated above one of the nicest coffee bars of Belgium, it’s the perfect spot to start your day.
FREE BREAKFAST (coffee, juice, croissant) every morning!!
Flexible self check- in after 3pm.
Bicycle storage available in the ground floor garage, underground public car park nearby (150m). 20m from the central train station, the perfect base to explore Gent and other cities!

The space
You enter this recently renovated apartment through the garage. There are stairs to the first. At the first floor there is an other door with key lock. The stairs behind this door lead to the actual apartment.
At the second floor you can find the living room with high quality sound system and television and quite a basic kitchen. Fridge, microwave / oven and dishwasher are available. It’s a nice, welcoming, open space with tons of daylight.
neighborhood_overview:
‘Asking citizens of Ghent what they think of their city is a pointless exercise: you’ll find only unanimous love. And with good reason. Ghent is one of Europe’s greatest discoveries - small enough to feel cosy but big enough to stay vibrant. It has enough medieval frivolity to create a spectacle but retains a gritty industrial edge that keeps things ‘real’. Tourists remain surprisingly thin on the ground, yet with its fabulous canalside architecture, wealth of quirky bars and some of Belgium’s most fascinating museums, this is a city you really won’t want to miss’ (Lonely Planet). Everything on walking distance from the appartement!

Het unieke karakter van - het historisch centrum - van Gent behoeft nog weinig reclame. Ondertussen algemeen gekend als topbestemming voor een onvergetelijke citytrip. Alles bevindt zich op wandelafstand van het appartement!
host_about:
After an academic career and being a teacher for some years, I now am the proud owner of my own coffee bar “Café Labath”. I’m spending a great deal of my time on my passion for coffee and hospitality. Doing sports, traveling, reading and riding my motorbike are some other things I love. 
At this point I have expanded the business to the point that we follow up on the entire chain from coffee tree to cup. I’m spending a lot of time in Colombia, where I visit local farmers in order to get the best coffee for the coffee bar. 
I used to travel quite adventurously myself. I still cherish these memorable moments of spontaneous hospitality and I take this as starting point to treat my guests.

Na een academische carrière en jaren in het onderwijs, ben ik sinds 2011 de trotse eigenaar van het koffiehuis “Café Labath” te Gent. 
Mijn passie voor koffie en hospitality vraagt het grootste deel van mijn tijd, daarnaast ga ik graag sporten, lezen en motorijden. Ik heb enkele avontuurlijke reizen gedaan, en de reismicrobe heeft me nog steeds niet losgelaten. Intussen spendeer ik veel tijd in Colombia, om daar “Direct Trade” koffie te zoeken. Door goede banden op te bouwen met lokale boeren, kan ik de lekkerste koffies importeren voor de koffiebar.
De memorabele momenten van spontane gastvrijheid op mijn reizen koester ik nog steeds. Die gastvrijheid heb ik steeds zelf voor ogen bij het ontvangen van mijn gasten.

neighborhood_overview: Houtbriel is een zeer rustige straat gelegen vlak achter de bruisende Sint Jacobs en Vrijdagsmarkt buurt. Van op onze terrasjes heb je zicht op de Sint Baafs toren.  Alle  monumenten, winkelstraten en restaurants zijn heel vlot te voet te bereiken.
host_about:
Hallo, 

Wij zijn Annik & Kristof. 
Wij verwelkomen jullie graag in hartje Gent. 

Kristof kwam ooit in Gent studeren en was meteen verliefd op de stad.  Een heel aantal jaren later werd Annik verliefd op Kristof en kwam zo ook in Gent terecht. 

Samen proberen we van elk moment in onze stad te genieten en we vinden het steeds ook heel leuk onze gasten wegwijs te maken. 

Regelmatig trekken we toch ook samen op reis, want dat is waarschijnlijk een van de dingen die we het liefst samen doen.

The space
Minimum reservation for 2 nights required.

The ultra quiet Duplex Apartment room on the second floor can accommodate up to 6 persons. The spacious room of roughly 80 sq meters provides a view over the 3 towers that dominate the Ghent skyline as well as the medieval Gravensteen castle. The room is furnished with two king-size beds, 2 single beds, a private bathroom with bath tub and a kitchen, ideal for longer stays.
The room is equipped with central heating, cable TV and WIFI internet access.

Breakfast is in the room, bread is served every morning by the host.

All tourist attractions are within walking distance. Reach the station by tram in about 15 minutes. You can park your car at the n

name: ★Charming & Historic villa, garden & free parking★
description:
Your perfect retreat in a marvelous city. Plus we offer you what not many airbnb's in Ghent can offer:
- Beautiful and spacious villa located in the Arts District of Ghent
- About 10 minutes by foot from the famous Van Eyck expo and the historic centre
- Amazing garden with lounge set + BBQ
- Free car parking available on our driveway! (Up to 3 cars)
- You will be able to self check-in yourself upon arrival.

The space
Villa Pater is a gem with a unique history. It was built in 1904 as a weekend stay by Edmond Paternotte, a stonemason whose family imported the famous Belgian blue-stone imported from Hainaut for centuries. The family has worked on several famous monuments in Ghent, from St. Peter's Abbey to the Palace of Justice. Moreover, Edmond Paternotte has carved several artistic tombstones in the cemetery Campo Santo, the Pere Lachaise of Ghent. As a good Belgian, he was also a brewer.

Various elements in Villa Pater refle
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a quiet neighborhood near the train station Gent-Sint-Pieters this is your ideal base. Not only to discover the beauty of Ghent. Thanks to the train (at 2 minutes walk!) You are also in no time in the other Flemish cities such as Bruges (25 min), Antwerp (40 min) and Brussels (35 min). Paris, London or Amsterdam are only a few hours away too!

There is a lovely sunny garden of 700 square meters, wonderful place to relax in and romp. You can hear nothing from the busy city life and a big gate also gives a strong sense of privacy.

Everything is within walking distance: the many museums in the vicinity (STAM, SMAK, Museum of Fine Arts), the historic center and its monuments, the St Bavo's Cathedral, the opera, the theater, cinemas, shops, breakfast and coffee houses . We also offer you tips for the best and most charming restaurants in Ghent. For every budget.

For those who love sport and recreation: the new stadium of our national soccer champio
host_about: Hi there, fellow traveller! Thanks for choosing our house in Ghent. Together with my husband I've travelled all over the world. With our two children (11&14) we lived in China (Beijing) for 5 years and from there we discovered Asia. Then we moved to  the US (Washington DC and Menlo Park) for 4 years and from there we discovered the Americas. We published several books about our adventures. Now we're back in our amazing hometown Ghent, and from here we're (re)discovering the beauty of Europe. We used AirBnb all over the world, and that's why we' ld love to share Villa Pater with you, our beautiful little secret in Ghent.

Free Parking: park-and-ride (1.5 km): Brusselsesteenweg under E17

Public Transport: Tram and bus are around the corner.
neighborhood_overview:
The appartment lies between a river and canal.
Just next to the appartment is a little citypark.

ROUTE PLAN to my appartment with car:

Coming from the motorway E17: you should choose the exit: ‘Gent center’.
At the first traffic lights, go to the right on the inner ring. Then, on that ringway, immediately take the first exit to the right.
At the traffic lights: go left under the viaduct, but IMMEDIATELY turn right once you passed the bridge (be carefull, there is first an exit from the ring in the other direction). The street you must go in, looks a bit like a walking street, but it goes immediately over the water and then turn into the Visserij.
If you missed this point: you must turn back (at the Brusselsepoortstraat)
and at the traffic lights: keep left, and turn left BEFORE the bridge, YES you can drive there!
There is no other way to go to my street: Visserij (one direction only).

Thank you, you are amazing!
host_about: Alive and well and living in Gent

name: Modern, Luxurious, Quiet
description:
This house is super modern and still very cosy and charming. The house dates from 1907 and is totally renovated. The staircase is a silent whitness of the old days.
The garden is big and luxurious in a very quiet neighbourhood.

The space
The room has a nice view on the garden. It is for two persons and has a double bed. Next to the room there is the spaceuous bathroom that has a whirlpool and a raindance shower.
The living has a fireplace.
The location is perfect to visit Ghent. 5 min walk from the train station and for 1,5 euro you take the tram right to the heart of the old town that takes 10 min.
Bruges is only 35 min with the train.

Guest access
Shared bathroom. Shared modern and fully equiped kitchen. Shared living with piano and guitar.
Private toilet
Separate entry door

Other things to note
I speak fuently English, French, Dutch. I speak German and a little Italian and Spanish
neighborhood_overview: Quiet, green and still very close to all facilities. you can do everything by foot. Easy reachable with public transport and car. Private parking available at 3€ per day
host_about:
I am an Airline pilot. I live by myself and love to meet new people all over the world.
I am a sporty guy that likes to laugh. I play music and sing. 
I love Ghent, such a beatiful city. Even more then Bruges where I lived before.
I can tell you a lot about the city and show the nicest places to go to.
When I travel, I want to see and experiance as much as possible. I like to see how people really live and not take just the touristic paths.
If you come to my place you will experiance how the Belgian people really are and I am sure you will have an unforgettable time!

name: Designer Loft
description:
Spacious 19th century loft ( 200m2) with parking place offers you everything you need, within walking distance of the historic center of Ghent

The space
The duplex loft is housed in what used to be an old textile-factory, complete with the typical columns, but nowadays offers a luxurious and quiet zenlike space.
You will enjoy your completely private stay in this loft that easily accomodates 4 to 5 people.
The two sleeping areas, located on the upper level, are separated by frosted-glass sliding panels ( you can hear each other). One area with airco comes with comfortable adjustable kingsize-bed, the other one with two separate beds. Two bathrooms ( one with shower, the other with bath) Two toilets.
A bed-sofa ( 1 person) is also provided in the living room. You will enjoy the fully equipped kitchen ( oven, combi-micro-wave, dishwasher, fridge and freezer, espresso-machine and a professional gas cooking-plate.
Do you need to get some work
neighborhood_overview:
The loft is located just on the edge of the city centre, not a very special area, but safe. The building has acoustic-insulated windows, that keeps the street-noise outside.
A beautiful nearby parc ( 200m) offers playground and picnic possibilities. Fitness centre nearby ( 30m)
An exceptional natural reserve is found nearby, "BOURGOYEN", where you can find beautiful walking trails.The reserve offers special nature exploration programs. You can also use the sports facilities at the nearby "watersportbaan", where a lot of famous athletes practice daily.

name: Bright apt. with free parking and free bicycles
description:
Health and safety first : the apartment is cleaned and disinfected thoroughly after every stay. Bedding and towels are washed with disinfected detergents. Disinfected hand gel and spray is at your disposal.

Welcome to this bright, airy and sunny apartment. It is located on the top floor of my 2-story apartment, which is part of a big old villa.There is one double bedroom, bathroom with shower and a living room with kitchen. Two bikes are included. Parking is free of charges !

The space
The apartment has been furnished with patience and consideration. It comprises a bathroom with a shower and toilet, a bedroom with a comfortable double bed and a spacious living room with kitchen.


Bed linnen and towels are included. There is a hairdryer in the bathroom. Shampoo and shower gel are provided.

The apartment measures 60 m2.

The apartment is located in a residential and quiet street in Mariakerke, a borough of Ghent. Park
neighborhood_overview:
This borough of Ghent is quiet and residential. Its location makes it a perfect spot to either visit the city or spend a day in the countryside.
There is a supermarket, bakery and butcher nearby. The Guislain museum is a stone's throw away. In summertime, there is the 'Parkcafé' where you can sit outside, enjoy the live music and have a bite to eat.
host_about:
Hi,
I'm Wim and I live in 'Ghent' - Belgium. Although Ghent is a surprisingly beautiful city, I love to travel around and meet the world. And if possible, I like to combine traveling with running, which is my only addiction (besides sweets and cake...:-)..). Short runs, marathons, trails, ... I love to run them all. 
And in between, I love to host you with the greatest pleasure in my apartment !

The space
Our house offers you a fantastic living experience in our great city, Ghent.

It is a light open house with 3 floors, we only used pure simple materials to construct the house: concrete, wood & glass. Less is more, certainly applies to our house.

Via a "room wide" window, that can be entirely opened, the living area connects to a large terrace, it just adds another 20m2 of fresh air to the first floor, if you like.

On the second floor there is a bedroom, bathroom and small balcony. There is also a small seating area and room to put your

name: Luxury Duplex in Historic Centre
description:
In this newly renovated duplex apartment (2nd & 3rd floor) in a quiet street, you will find style and comfort next to each other. All the hotspots in Ghent are within walking distance.

Guest access
Our private duplex apartment has two bedrooms with 7pocket boxspring beds, two toilets, a fully equipped kitchen, a salon, and a bathroom.

Other things to note
Although we are located in the centre of the city. It is always quiet in our street. Even during the festivities of the "Gentse Feesten", you won't hear any noise. There is always coffee and tea available.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the historic centre of Ghent between Vrijdagsmarkt and Sint-Jacobs. Almost every "must visit place" is on a walking distance. Our neighbourhood is known for it's young and hip vibe, where you can find independent coffee bars, vintage shops, flee markets, nice restaurants and the most swinging bars of Ghent!
As we are located in a rather small street, it is always quiet.
host_about:
Born in Ghent, raised in Bruges. Came back to Ghent 6 years ago to open a contemporary art gallery on the ground floor of an old house in the historic centre of Ghent.

I see myself as someone with a natural joy of life. I love to meet new people that share the same enthusiasm.

Although I love travelling, I didn't have much opportunity since I opened the gallery. I can enjoy a weekend city trip as much as a month backpacking on the other side of the world. 

As your host, I will gladly help you with any kind of problem.

name: For lovers of green and vintage :-)
description:
Up for rent whilst finishing redecorating our other house : a great sunny house with airy spaces and small yet extremely green garden. Located just outside the center of our beautiful city, a tram stops in our street and takes you there in 10 to 20 minutes. Enjoy!

The space
We are planning on renting out the house for real, but as it needs to be finished renovating our other house we rent this one out on airbnb. There is one master bedroom which has the bathroom integrated, so the house is only fit for families or couples. There are 2 other bedrooms, of which one is unavailable. There are 2 children beds in the master bedroom though, so the house is fit for babies and small children as well. We like it te be rented out for longer stays, as that is more convenient. Important : the cleaning lady comes every monday from 8 tot 12, so bear in mind that at that time you do not have the house to yourself. We're looking forward to seeing you. :-)

Guest acce
neighborhood_overview: It's a lively neighbourhood, in the 19th century belt around the city of Ghent. Very mixed, and usually rather quiet in summer as most people are away.. :-)
host_about:
Hi all,
I'm a landscape designer, living in Gent in Belgium. Since a couple of months me and my son are living with my girlfriend and kids at her house. The idea is to rent out my own place, but until it's fully redecorated, painted and empty, it's up for you all to enjoy it. Have fun, and welcome in our beautiful city ;-)
