description:
Hello, :)
The house has a quiet atmosphere even though it is located close to the centre of Ghent. Easy to reach with the tram. The entire house is at disposal. Own kitchen, bathroom (shower), living room, small garden in the front and a small garden in the back. There are 2 bedrooms. Ideal for a couple with child. One double bed and 1 adult single bed. Furniture present, kitchen supplies and toys can be used. There is a huge parking space and a square in the front of the house.

name: Spacious, quality bedroom in city centre Ghent!
description:
A private room with big windows at the 1st floor of a modern appartment in Ghent-centre. Everything you'll need you can find within 5 minutes walking distance. Public transportation trams, shops, restaurants and bars are literally around the corner. The very heart of the city center is at a 5 to 10 minutes walking distance. The room and appartement are very clean and inviting. An underground, safe parking space is available if needed. With elevator. Wheelchair access possible through basement.

The space
The room you'll be staying in is very clean. It has a double bed with clean sheets and there is a sofa. The cosy, spacious living room is also at your disposal. We will share that together, as goes for the bathroom and kitchen. The kitchen is practically new and fully equipped. Feel free to use anything at any time. There will be a shelf reserved for you in the fridge. The bathroom has a bath and shower. Shampoo, shower gells and clean towels are at your disposal

name: NEW: Book a luxury stay, enjoy the Ghent city life
description:
Looking for a unique place to stay in Ghent? Choose our place for contempory living in a completely refurbished authentic townhouse that dates back to the beginning of the 20th century.

Discover and enjoy the Ghent city life at walking distance.

Right across the city park 'Groene Vallei' (green valley), ideal for picknicks and only a breath away from 'Blaarmeersen' sports and recreation park.

Fresh linen and nespresso? We offer all the modern amenities that make you feel right at home.

The space
Our place has a master bedroom with ensuite bathroom (sleeps 2 - baby cot possible at request), and a large duplex room (sleeps 3) with ensuite shower and mezzanine. We have a normal sized extra bed for a child at your disposal should you need this. We have to say that the stairs in the duplexsuite are steep, as you can see in the pictures. The bedrooms are fitted with new quality beds.

The living room has an eco-leather sofa
neighborhood_overview:
You are in walking distance to the city center.

Ghent's best restaurants are around the corner (check out Volta, Oak and Door 73, just a few steps away) and there is a large grocery store for all your supplies across the street.

Our place is located right across the city park Groene Vallei (green valley), ideal for picknicks and close to Blaarmeersen sports and recreation park, a green jewel beside the Watersportbaan in Ghent. This is where Ghent residents come jogging, and rowing clubs battle it out on the water. It is a lovely area for walking, with a vast lake. You can swim, hire a pedalo, or go kayaking, surfing, fishing and diving. A large sandy beach for everyone makes the Blaarmeersen in Ghent complete. If you’re looking for sporting activities in Ghent, this is the place to be!
Ghent is a small city where everything is concentrated within a couple of square kilometers, so all of the museums and historic buildings are nearby. Ghent has an ideal positio

name: 50/60's vintage BelEtage near city Centre of Ghent
description:
It is a beautiful bel etage near the center of Ghent. On the first floor there is a big kitchen with oven, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, washing and drying machine, cooking fire, all kind of kitchen material. There is a beautiful terras on the first floor where you can chill and hangout. There is a vintage 50s /60s living with tv, netflix, .... There are 3 rooms. There is a tram 30 meters from the house. 10 min by foot from the city center.

The space
You can use all the kitchen material, we also have a big freezer in the basement where you can store things. There is a big hallway to put your bike or other stuff

Guest access
You can use the kitchen, coffee machine with fresh beans, microwave, oven, fridge, freezer, tv, games, boardgames, dvds, rooms, bathroom, shampoo, towels, ...
neighborhood_overview: It is a street with a lot of shops near by to to your groceries, a lot of frituur, kebabs and a nightshop next to the house.

name: Ruime suite in herenhuis met zonnig privé terras
description:
Of je nu als koppel, vrienden of gezin in het pas gerenoveerde OH2 verblijft, aan comfort en luxe ontbreekt het niet.
Hoge plafonds en ramen zorgen voor lichtrijke ruimtes en een rustgevende vibe. Een groot, zonnige terras/binnenkoer laat je maximaal van de warme dagen genieten. Uniek in het centrum van de stad. Van cosy kamerjassen over toiletartikelen tot de Nespresso machine...alles is aanwezig om het hotelgevoel te evenaren. Voor de doe-het-zelver zijn er een oven, kookplaat enz. aanwezig.

The space
Je privacy en rust zijn belangrijk en zijn hier in overvloed te vinden. De slaapkamer ligt aan de achterzijde van het pand zodat je nachtrust niet door stadse geluiden verstoord wordt.
Het luxueuze king size bed kan tot twin beds omgevormd worden.
Voor de beste nachtrust kiest men uit een 'medium' of 'firm' matras.
De dekbedden en hoofdkussens zijn uit hypoallergene/antibacteriële bamboo vervaardigd.
Ook het zetelbed (1m40) met pocket
neighborhood_overview: Je vindt OH2 in hartje Gent, op een steenworp van de beroemde 3 torens. Zin in een ontbijt in de hipste koffiebar van Gent? Je hoeft enkel de straat over te steken. Op zoek naar een gezellige, lekkere restaurantje? Draai de hoek om en   geniet van heerlijke Italiaanse keuken. Het afzakkertje neem je gewoon in de coole jazzclub ernaast. Bezienswaardigheden, shopping, restaurants en terrasjes bereik je allemaal na 3 minuutjes wandelen.

name: Spacious house near Ghent, near park/walking paths
description:
Ons rustig gelegen huis is ideaal om Gent te ontdekken. Anderzijds zijn er ook verschillende parken, wandelpaden langs het water en fijne fietsroutes.

Op de benedenverdieping kom je meteen binnen in de open keuken en ruime living met houtkachel. Achter de grote glasramen is er een gezellige, zonnige tuin.
De eerste verdieping telt 3 slaapkamers, een badkamer (bad+douche) en een toilet.

Er is een mooie wandelroute naar het centrum van Gent. Om de hoek is er een bus die elke 10 minuten vertrekt.

The space
Op de gelijkvloerse verdieping beschik je over een open keuken, een ruime living met houtkachel, een leeshoek, een zonnige, groene stadstuin met groot terras.
Op de eerste verdieping vind je 3 ruime slaapkamers met wastafel, een badkamer (bad+douche) en een apart toilet.

Other things to note

neighborhood_overview:
Op wandelafstand is er een bakkerij, slager, buurtwinkel, supermarkt, apotheek.

In de buurt zijn er ook verschillende parken, wandelpaden langs het water en fijne fietsroutes.

Met de bus is er zowel van station Gent-Dampoort als van station Gent-Sint-Pieters een eenvoudige verbinding (https://www.delijn.be/en/routeplanner/).

Groetjes,

Lieselotte

description:
Newly renovated with all modern comfort at just 2 min walking from the castle Gravensteen. The studio is 58 m2, has a well equiped kitchen, comfortable bed of 180 x 200, separated libary/tv room and modern bathroom with walk-in shower.its at 2nd Floor.

name: Separate and private Bed- & Bathroom in city house
description:
We have been living in Ghent for many years now and we love it.
Our neighbourhood is nice and quiet, at a very short walk from interesting musea, beautiful parks, good restaurants & bars, and a big movie theatre.
It is located at walking distance from the historic city centre, perfectly located and well-connected with all types of (public) transport.

We will give you any suggestions according to your preferences to make your stay an unforgettable one!
Come and visit our beautiful city Ghent!

The space
We can offer you a bedroom with adjacent private bathroom in our house, which is ideal for 2 people. Your space is located on the second floor of our house.
The private bathroom (with shower, toilet and sink) is located next to your bedroom.
Actually, you'll have full privacy at your own floor (no direct interaction). We clean very thoroughly the room and bathroom. Because of coronavirus, we disinfect all surfaces that could be

name: The Blue Room
description:
Cozy room available on the first floor in the lively Brugse Poort neighbourhood of Ghent, Belgium.
1.8km from the centre of the city, an easy walking distance along the canal or 5 mins with public transportation.
Communal kitchen, dining, living, bathroom and outside courtyard.
Currently a share house for an Australian girl and other Airbnb guests.
Note - The city of Ghent charges a tax of €3 per person per night. This can be paid on arrival or through Airbnb.

Other things to note
Tourist tax in Europe 2020.

In Ghent, tourists are obligated to pay an overnight accommodation tax.
This city tax is €3 per person per night.
This can be paid on arrival in cash.

name: studio medieval city center at river "de Leie"
description:
Hedendaagse privéstudio met eigen ingang in een jonge creatieve buurt in het historisch centrum van Gent. Unieke ligging aan de Leie, in het verlengde van de Graslei en rechtover het middeleeuwse Pand met tal van leuke eet-en drinkgelegenheden, winkels en historische gebouwen rondom. Gratis parkeren op P+R, 5 minuten met pendelbus naar het centrum en studio op korte wandelafstand.
Belangrijke mededeling: mogelijke hinder door renovatiewerken aan historisch gebouw naast de studio.

The space
U verblijft in een heel nette, inspirerende moderne studio met alle voorzieningen. Snelle WIFI inbegrepen. Goed uitgeruste keuken om uw eigen potje te koken. Een heerlijke koffie of theetje zijn aanwezig. Afkoelen in de zomer (ook ventilator aanwezig), lekker warm nest gedurende de rest van het jaar. Gedesinfecteerd, goed gepoetst (producten aanwezig). Handdoeken, gels, body producten inbegrepen.

Guest access
Uw private studio is volledig ter uwer be
neighborhood_overview: Winkels, eet- en drinkgelegenheden, musea, cultuur, water: alles is mogelijk in de onmiddellijke omgeving. Uw studio bevindt zich in het midden van het historische centrum van Gent.
host_about:
Wij zijn ondernemende mensen die onze gasten graag in alle vrijheid Gent willen  laten ontdekken.
Zelf houden wij van een dagje aan zee of een stadsbezoek en een jaarlijkse reis naar Frankrijk met de kinderen om te genieten van het goede leven.

name: ROOF TOP STUDIO MET ZICHT OP DE DRIE TORENS
description:
"rooftop studio" is een gezellige en ruime studio met zonning terras, gelegen in de 19de eeuwse gordel van Gent, met heel wat bartjes, restaurants, winkels,... nabij het historisch centrum.
Je slaapt er in een fijn ingerichte dakstudio dat uitkijkt op de Gentse torens. Het heeft een knusse slaapkamer verstopt achter een groot gordijn, een kleine kitchentte, een open badkamer en een verrassend zonnig terras. De loft is voor 2 personen met 1 tweepersoonsbed.

The space
De studio is een privé appartement waarbij niets gedeeld wordt behalve de trap. Roken in de studio of op het terras is niet toegestaan. Parkeren kan in de omliggende straten of een beveiligde parking om de hoek.
neighborhood_overview: Het is een leuke uitvalsbasis om Gent te verkennen, op wandelafstand van het historisch centrum, maar ook tram en bushalte op slechts 1 min stappen, brengt jullie richting centrum en beide treinstations.

name: Newly Renovated Cosy Apartment in City Center
description:
- Newly renovated apartment with a stylish Scandinavian design and a cosy feel
- Excellent location in the city center (Next to Gravensteen). Everything within walking distance.
- Great public transport to train stations (Gent-Sint-Pieters & Gent-Dampoort) and business centers (Dok Noord, Flanders Expo, Gent Zuid...)
- Easily reachable by car with plenty of parking solutions.
- Daily disinfection of doorhandles (Covid-19).

The space
You will be staying in a stylishly designed, Scandinavian inspired apartment with a cosy feel to it. It is the ideal place to explore the city with friends, family or colleagues!

- In the past year, the building has been completely renovated to the latest standards (incl. state-of-the art fire safety).
- A high chair and baby cot can be provided upon request
- Fresh bed linen and towels are provided

Guest access
You will have the entire loft to yourself, including a priva
neighborhood_overview:
Experience Ghent from it's beautiful historic center! Located right next to the Castle Of The Counts (aka Het Gravensteen), all the city's treasures are within walking distance:
- Veldstraat and Korenmarkt for shopping
- Korenmarkt and Vlasmarkt for going out
- Patershol and Graslei for restaurants and outside terrasses
- Lievekaai and Prinsenhof for a romantic walk
- A lot of museums (Design Museum, Huis Van Alijn, Kunsthal Gent), medieval churches, cathedrals, belfry... around the corner

All the while you are in a quiet neighbourhood without much street noise. You'll be hard-pressed to find a better location to explore the city from!

name: Deluxe Double/Twin Room in the city centre
description:
Cosy room for 1 or 2 guests, hidden in a quiet and narrow street in the heart of the city centre. The room has a DOUBLE BED, but can be prepared with TWIN BEDS upon request (before 1:00 pm on check-in day). The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a shower, bath towels, shampoo and a hairdryer. Stunning view of St. Bavo's Cathedral. Suitable for couples or friends.

The space
Our hotel is a little home right in the heart of the city. We have recently renovated the common areas downstairs based on our project for a "New Flandria Hotel", more connected to the city of Ghent. In our bar you can meet Betty Bijoux, a lady from the 20's who will be happy to serve you some good Belgian beers or strong Italian coffee : )

Guest access
You have access to your room and all the common areas of the building (hall, reception, breakfast room, bar).
neighborhood_overview: Our hotel is located in the heart of Ghent, a few steps away from St. Bavo's Cathedral, the Castle of Counts and other important attractions of the city. It is hidden in a little street surrounded by canals where you can admire the beautiful lights of the city. Thanks to its special position, you will be able to enjoy the most vibrant spots of the city, knowing you have a calm and cosy room waiting for you at walking distance.
host_about:
With only 22 rooms, our FLANDRIA HOTEL FEELS LIKE A HOME, a cosy place where you can find us: local, multilingual people, ready to welcome and help you. We are just 10 people here; a small family that’s happy to make you feel at home and to show you the best our city has to offer. Apart from the homely atmosphere, there are other reasons to stay at our place: 

PERFECT LOCATION – our hotel is hidden in a narrow and calm street, where you can sleep peacefully and dream the sweetest dreams. At the same time, we are close to the vibrant spots of the city where you can experience the best Belgian beer and the best city views.

BEST COFFEE IN TOWN – if you are a coffeeholic, our hotel is the place to be! In our bar you can drink a real Italian espresso and cappuccino, or try different specialities with coffee as the main ingredient. Our coffee provider (Caffè Pedron) is 100 % Italian – and nobody does coffee like the Italians do!

name: sunny townhouse in Gent
description:
Perfectly situated and recently renovated spacious townhouse in a quiet neighborhood at 15 min walk from Gent St-Pieters train station and 15 min walk from the historic city center. A direct tram connection gets you there even faster. There are two bikes available for you to explore the city.

The space
You have a separate bedroom on your own floor, with private toilet and bathroom with bathtub, rain-shower and sink. Showergel, shampoo and hairdryer are provided. The king size bed with Emma quality matras will provide for a relaxing sleep. Towels and bedlinen are provided.

Guest access
We will share the ground level: open dining area/breakfast bar/kitchen/living room and you have the possibility to use a modern, fully equipped kitchen. You also have access to the sunny rooftop terrace on the first floor, or if that gets too hot, the cosy city garden at ground level next to the living room always keeps it cool.

Other things to n
neighborhood_overview: The place is on the edge of the inner city, a 10 to 15 min walk to the historic city center. You will find several cosy café's en route to the city center. Nature reserve Bourgoyen is also close by, just outside of town. Several supermarkets, a bakery, and Ghent's most renowned 'frietkot' are all within 200 meters.
host_about: I like adventure traveling, mountain hiking, biking and road trips. I work as researcher in biological sciences, and a few years ago I finished Art Academy photography on the side. I am spontaneous and optimistic, and like getting to meet new people. I am happy to share my modern but cosy house with visitors looking to explore the wonderful and lively city of Ghent.

name: gerenoveerd appartement centrum Gent
description:
Toplocatie, vlakbij het Zuid, de Vooruit en het Capitole. Op wandelafstand van Korenmarkt en Sint-Pietersplein. Het appartement bevindt zich op de bovenste verdieping van het gebouw. Daardoor heb je een panoramisch zicht over centrum Gent en heel veel lichtinval. Vlot te bereiken via station en bus of tram-verbinding. Dichtbij afrit autostrade E40 en E17.

The space

name: Casa Gante 9000 with garden and covered terrace!
description:
Beautiful renovated apartment with spectacular garden and covered terrace. Located in the arts neighbourhood of Ghent. Parks, shops bars and restaurants at walking distance

The space
You have the whole ground floor at your disposal with separate shower, toilet and kitchen, a glass door gives you acces to a spacious covered terrace and garden.

Guest access
The house is a spacious bell-etage house. You will stay in the renovated ground floor and we live upstairs. The ground floor has a bedroom and living room separated by a glass door. Further down the hall there is a toilet, shower, kitchen and acces to the terrace and garden. The basement can be used for clothes cleaning and drying. Everything upstairs is off limits to guests!

Other things to note
The house is a typical Belgian bell- etage, so you have the ground floor to your selfs and we live upstairs. we only share entrance and garden.
neighborhood_overview: Very nice neighborhood in the arts center of the city. Everything within walking distance. Bakkery, grocery, restaurants, bars within 1k. Also a splendid view from the garden on the city skyline.
host_about:
Hey, I've been living in Ghent for over 15 years. Ghent is the ideal mix between Brussels, Antwerp and Bruges. But most important Ghent is by far the most fun of all Belgian cities. It has a unique, lefty, young and dynamic atmosphere. With lots of nice restaurants and bars to go out and to have contact with the locals, because people in Ghent are multilingual and have a broad view on the world and his inhabitants!

As flight attendants  we’ve been travelling all over the world and had to stay in hotels. Hotel rooms are practically all the same and so I find it more enjoyable to stay in houses of local people. In addition you get more insight information wich I value.

My house is situated in the arts neighborhood and very close to the trainstation and the main highways entering the city.

Hallo, ik woon al 20 jaar in de mooiste maar vooral leukste stad van België. Ons huis staat in het centrum van de kunstenbuurt en is voorzien van alle comfort.

Wij reizen voor ons werk de hele wereld af en moeten noodgedwongen in hotels overnachten. Dat is vaak heel eentonig en saai. Daarom vinden wij reizen en slapen bij mensen thuis een mooi alternatief.

name: Deluxe Suite
description:
Soak up the atmosphere of the 1879 build house by the family de Werchin. its family tree goes back to 1100 ac. We have tried to give it it's old glory back and send you back in time. Enjoy our enormous mid city garden or the old city center on sunny days. We are situated on the 'Art-Mile' of Ghent where you have on walking distance of 5 Musea

The space
the space is filled with original modern art items from 1950 to 1970. blended with original 1900 tile's and decoration

Guest access
guest can use our garden and dinning area but also have their private dining area. parking space is a ailable or a garage to place a bike.
neighborhood_overview: park and museum area of the city. a movie theater and swimming pool on 500m walking distance
host_about:
Een gezin die het avontuur van zijn leven begon in een historisch pand te Gent.  Je kan ons vinden op de kunstenkilometer van Gent: het SMAK, MSK en de Bijlokesite (met o.a. KASK en STAM) liggen allemaal op dezelfde as. Het gebouw is een deel van de historie, met een architectuur en geschiedenis die we in zijn waarde laten.

Ons pand is gebouwd in opdracht van Laurent de Werchin. Van de gekende de Werchin familie waarvan de stamboom te vinden is tot 1100NC. De bekendste daarvan was Baron Pierre de Werchin.h Ridder aan het hof van Keizer Karel. Zijn wapenschild is de bezichtigen in de st baafskathedraal.

 Naast onze eigen tuin kunnen gasten genieten van twee parken binnen 500m. Het muinkpark en het Citadelpark.

name: Newly Renovated Cosy Apartment in City Center
description:
- Newly renovated apartment with a stylish Scandinavian design and a cosy feel
- Excellent location in the city center (Next to Gravensteen). Everything within walking distance.
- Great public transport to train stations (Gent-Sint-Pieters & Gent-Dampoort) and business centers (Dok Noord, Flanders Expo, Gent Zuid...)
- Easily reachable by car with plenty of parking solutions.
- Daily disinfection of doorhandles (Covid-19).

The space
You will be staying in a stylishly designed, Scandinavian inspired apartment with a cosy feel to it. It is the ideal place to explore the city with friends, family or colleagues!

- In the past year, the building has been completely renovated to the latest standards (incl. state-of-the art fire safety).
- A high chair and baby cot can be provided upon request
- Fresh bed linen and towels are provided

Guest access
You will have the entire loft to yourself, including a priva
neighborhood_overview:
Experience Ghent from it's beautiful historic center! Located right next to the Castle Of The Counts (aka Het Gravensteen), all the city's treasures are within walking distance:
- Veldstraat and Korenmarkt for shopping
- Korenmarkt and Vlasmarkt for going out
- Patershol and Graslei for restaurants and outside terrasses
- Lievekaai and Prinsenhof for a romantic walk
- A lot of museums (Design Museum, Huis Van Alijn, Kunsthal Gent), medieval churches, cathedrals, belfry... around the corner

All the while you are in a quiet neighbourhood without much street noise. You'll be hard-pressed to find a better location to explore the city from!

name: Modern apartment close to Flanders Expo
description:
Modern and stylish apartment on the outskirts of the lovely city Gent.

In walking distance to the ‘Flandes Expo’ event center and close to the train station Gent Sint-Pieters (+/- 1.5 km). It will take you about 10-15 min to reach the city center by bike or car.

If you travel by car, you have immediate access to the highways E40 (Brussels - Belgian coastline) and E17 (Antwerp/Netherlands - France).

There is a tram stop at the Flanders Expo that goes straight to the heart of the city center.

The space
Extra: free parking, netflix, city information (inside tips)
neighborhood_overview: The recreational (sport)park ‘de Blaarmeersen’ is just around the corner. More information on activities and getting around upon request!
host_about:
Hi! 

I am Koen, pronounced as in ha-koen-a matata or Koen-Fu :). Friends also call me a lot by my middle name: Roger!

Enjoying life to the fullest and truly happy when enjoying a nice drink in the presence of good company, preferably in an exciting location. When I am traveling, I try to get to know the city at an easy pace without going through a busy program. 

My apartment is located in the outskirts of the lovely city Gent, close to the train station and the 'Flanders Expo' event center. Also, the recreational (sport)park ‘de Blaarmeersen’ is just around the corner. By bike or car it takes 10-15 min to the city center (yes, it's the same!). 
If you travel by car, you have immediate access to the highways E40 (Brussels - Belgian coastline) and E17 (Antwerp/Netherlands - France).

Looking forward to meet you.
Koen (Roger)

Wil je op een unieke locatie in hartje Gent logeren met uitzicht op het Belfort vanop je privéterras? Een prachtig gedesigned privé-appartement met 3 verdiepingen zorgt voor een luxueus verblijf bij je bezoek aan Gent.(+ parking)

Dit appartement ligt echt in het historische stadscentrum van Gent. Parkeerruimte is vlakbij in de parking van de 'Vrijdagsmarkt'. The space
A big living area with dining table and fully equipped kitchen is to be found on our ground floor, on sunny days we invite you to have a drink on the terrace in our garden. Three big bedrooms and two bathrooms await you once you climb the stairs to the other floors.

host_about: Angela and Boudewijn are retired “empty nesters” and enjoy traveling immensely.  When traveling ourselves, we very much like to stay in a real home, rather than a hotel. Hier geen gebrek aan gezellige terrasjes, betaalbare restaurants en hippe cafés.
Een half uurtje wandelen van de Gentse universiteit site Sint-Pietersnieuwstraat/Blandijn.
Op 20' van een zwembadcomplex en een kwartiertje van een 240 ha groot natuurreservaat langs de Schelde met een fiets- en wandelpad. Ideaal voor joggers of om te bekomen na dat nachtje stappen...

name: Master Bedroom in Ghent (8 min. from center)
description:
Welcome to our house near the waterside in Ghent. We are situated in a quiet area with easy access to the city center and the train stations (tram stop is 1 minute away).

We offer towels, soap, and laundry service. In our kitchen you'll find coffee, tea, cooking herbs, olive oil, pots and pans, utensils. All are free to use.

This is a family-owned house with 2 Airbnb rooms. We are cleaning and disinfecting our rooms after each guest and we maintain social distancing.

The space
Ground Floor: living room, kitchen, toilet, and bathroom.
First Floor: we have 2 x Airbnb rooms available.
Second Floor: we have reserved the second floor as a private space.

This master bedroom has a private toilet and sink attached.

Guest access
All the common spaces and your own private room.
neighborhood_overview:
This entire city area has been renovated by the city government to include a new shopping center, housing projects, public schools, cultural venues, etc. Our street has just been renovated. The wobbly and narrow pavement has been replaced by a broad and flat one, and we all have a small facade garden now. Also the tramway and the parking spaces are brand-new.

Within 500 m of our house:
• ING Bank ATM
• Q8 Gas station
• Tram & Bus stops
• Dok Noord Shopping Center:
- Supermarket
- Pharmacy
- Fitness
- Coffee
- Sports Bar

name: Foulka huisje met tuin en gratis fietsen
description:
In een zeer rustige buitenwijk van Gent op 4 km van het stadscentrum in een verkaveling uit de jaren 60. Alles gelijkvloers. U hebt als gast de beschikking over een studio met aparte ingang, overdekt terras, privé tuin, autostaanplaats en 2 fietsen. De studio heeft zijn eigen centrale verwarmingssysteem, badkamer en zeer uitgeruste keuken. Tv en wifi, rookmelders enz..

The space
Wij investeerden in een goed bed voor 2 personen dat bij niet gebruik in het plafond schuift. Perfect voor wie ook niet meer piepjong is.

name: Uniek prachtig gelegen verblijf te Gent-centrum
description:
Prachtig gelegen verblijf te Gent-centrum in rustige, groene straat aan het water en het mooi en historisch waardevolle Rabot en de Prinsenhofwijk. In 10 minuutjes heerlijk wandelen langs De Lieve ben je aan het Gravensteen en de Korenmarkt. Er is openbaar vervoer naar het station en stadscentrum om de hoek, en er is steeds parkeergelegenheid in de straat.

The space
Je beschikt over een gelijkvloerse verdieping van een mooi statig herenhuis met private douche, toilet en terras. Het is een oude publieke sauna geweest dus geen echt appartement en wordt ook nog regelmatig door onszelf gebruikt wanneer er geen gasten zijn. Er is een kitchenette waar je eten kan opwarmen in de microgolfoven, maar geen fornuis dus je kan niet echt koken.

Other things to note
In de koelkast wordt ook drank en eten van onszelf bewaard.
Vroeger inchecken en/of laat uitchecken kan eventueel op aanvraag.
neighborhood_overview: Het Prinsenhof in Gent is een prachtig rustige plek waar je heerlijk kan wandelen tot het Gravensteen en het stadscentrum.
host_about: Ik word omschreven als een vriendelijke, attente gastvrouw en zorg ervoor dat ik altijd bereikbaar ben.

name: Ghent - the place to be The Cactus Room 2pax
description:
This guesthouse is located in the lively Brugse Poort neighbourhood in the city of Ghent.
Super cozy room on the second floor, it’s the perfect base for a weekend away.
1.8km from the centre of the city, an easy walking distance along the canal or 5 mins with the bike or public transportation.
Communal kitchen, dining, living, bathroom and courtyard.
Owned by an Australian, shared with other Airbnb guests.
Note - The city of Ghent charges a tax of €3 per person per night.

Other things to note
Tourist tax in Europe 2020.

In Ghent, tourists are obligated to pay an overnight accommodation tax.
This city tax is €3 per person per night.
This can be paid on arrival in cash.

name: Bright room in Art-deco House, Top location
description:
Bright spacious room in a newly renovated art deco house from the early 40's. Located in the heart of Ghent. You have a private kitchen + bathroom (shared w/ the 1 other airbnb-room) and we provide a set table so you've got a 'private restaurant' feeling. There's a lot of great take-aways in our street (such as Shazanna, Edgar Kaasbar, Golden Gai, Mission Massala, Baravins, ... We also have a cat called Dennis, who will give you the warmest welcome!

The space
The 3rd floor is only for our Airbnb-guests. We have 2 airbnb-rooms with a shared bathroom & kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: Our house is situated on a top location in Ghent: very central and easy accessible. All the restaurants, cafés etc are just around the corner (just like the famous Charlatan or St. Jacobs-church).
host_about: We're Clara & Agnör, a young couple from Belgium, Ghent. Agnör is working as a manager at the Airport, and Clara is working in photography & marketing. We both love traveling, electronic music, food, meeting new people and our cat Dennis.

Located in an old ‘cité’ recently renovated by Monument services, and decorated with original works of art, this loft offers painting and drawing facilities as well as free WiFi. Marvin & Laura

name: M/S Carpe-Diem "Cargo Hold" - Loft on a Barge
description:
M/S Carpe-Diem, "Seize-the-Day", is a barge built in 1951. The ship is moored in the old docklands of Ghent and has been transformed into an exceptional, eco-friendly home.
The ship's cargo hold has been renovated into a contemporary, loft-like residence of 65 square meter, with all modern comfort, including a heated outdoor pool with jet stream.
The cargo hold accommodates maximum 4 people, with two separate bedrooms with double beds.  Ideal for tourists and expatriate professionals.

The space
The ship, with registration n° 0600465, was purchased from a retired skippers couple in 2014.  The vessel had always been used to transport goods (e.g., wheat, steel rolls, etc.).  The ship measures 39,10 meter long by 5,05 meters wide.  It is powered by a still functional 268 kW Cummins Marine diesel engine.
​
The renovations started in 2015, based on a novel concept whereby the cargo hold remained intact and the main residence - consisting of conta
host_about:
Hello, I am Filip, father of two beautiful daughters and husband of an exceptional wife.

A few years ago we bought an old ship - actually in a flash of absolute lack of sense of reality.  In the meantime, we have renovated the ship and transformed it into a modern home.  Feel free to view the photos, the ship is the ideal base camp for exploring the city of Ghent and Flanders.

Travel safely ... and maybe see you soon, in Ghent.

Filip & C°

name: Stay aboard our 1914 Dutch Klipperaak
description:
We very much regret that due to the Coronavirus pandemic we are unable to welcome any guests to our home onboard our beautiful Dutch Klipperaak. As soon as we feel this threat has passed we will open up dates on our booking calendar.

The space
You are warmly welcomed aboard our beautiful 1914 Dutch Klipperaak barge. Check in is between 1500 - 2100hrs. We hope you will be very comfortable here with us. Our guest suite is dedicated to you for the duration of your stay and it is priced on a per night basis for up to two people. No discounts or single occupancy rate is offered. All bed linens, towels and basic toiletries are provided for our guests comfort and use during their stay onboard with us. Our minimum stay is 2 nights (longer by arrangement). Breakfast is in our large and very comfortable wheelhouse (accessed directly from the guest suite staircase). The wheelhouse is the only shared space onboard and it is has the main exit/entrance doors to the s
neighborhood_overview:
Our mooring is in the city and you are minutes away on foot from a plethora of shops, cafes, bars and many other visitor sites and attractions. We are happy to recommend various eateries based on our personal dining experience, so please do ask.
Parking: we do not have dedicated parking onsite, nor are we permitted a 'residents parking permit' as we do not own a car. However, there are various public parking options nearby. Some street parking is available on a first come first served basis and time limits will apply for the gratis (free) and paid (via street meter) spaces that are available. Ghent operates a park and ride system in addition to the many larger public carparks dotted around the area. All the information you might need regarding parking in the city is readily available on the internet for you to consider before making your booking.

name: Duplex Apt in City Centre with Terrace
description:
This spacious duplex apartment is perfect to discover Ghent, it is situated in the historic heart of Ghent, ideal to enjoy the cultural medieval city. Within 2 min walk, you have all the landmarks that Medieval Ghent has to offer; Graslei, Korenmarkt, the Castle of Counts, St Bavo's Cathedral, the Design museum and much more. You can enjoy the good weather on the terrace or have a cosy night inside, enjoying Netflix.

The space
The apartment is situated on the fourth floor and has 2 bedrooms with 2 double beds. The duplex has a great view on the Castle of Counts. The terrace offers an amazing view over historic Ghent.

Guest access
The whole apartment is accessible to guests.

Other things to note
The apartment is located in a car free zone, there are several underground parkings nearby.

It is also located in the heart of the city, so there is always movement and noise during the day/night on the streets below
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located on the ''Groentemarkt'', which is the heart of historic Ghent.
host_about:
Ghent is an awesome European City to visit, there is always something to do and to visit. Thats why I  would love to share my apartment with people who want to explore a medieval city with a touch of trendy.
I am self-employed at this moment and an everlasting student of knowledge and I hope we can meet during one of your stays.

name: Deluxe double room
description:
Je Kan ons vinden op de kunstenkilometer van Gent: het SMAK, MSK en de Bijlokesite (met o.a. KASK en STAM) liggen allemaal op dezelfde as. Het gebouw is een deel van de historie, met een architectuur en geschiedenis die we in zijn waarde laten.

Ons pand is gebouwd in opdracht van Laurent de Werchin. Van de gekende de Werchin. Een familie waarvan de stamboom te vinden is tot 1100NC. De bekendste daarvan Baron Pierre de Werchin Ridder aan het hof van Keizer Karel.

The space
De ruimtes bevinden zich in een herenhuis. De voorzieningen keuken en badkamer zijn prive en enkel voor de gast te gebruiken.

Guest access
garden
neighborhood_overview:
Je Kan ons vinden op de kunstenkilometer van Gent: het SMAK, MSK en de Bijlokesite (met o.a. KASK en STAM) liggen allemaal op dezelfde as. Het gebouw is een deel van de historie, met een architectuur en geschiedenis die we in zijn waarde laten.

Ons pand is gebouwd in opdracht van Laurent de Werchin. Van de gekende de Werchin familie waarvan de stamboom te vinden is tot 1100NC. De bekendste daarvan was Baron Pierre de Werchin.h Ridder aan het hof van Keizer Karel. Zijn wapenschild is de bezichtigen in de st baafskathedraal.

Naast onze eigen tuin kunnen gasten genieten van twee parken binnen 500m. Het muinkpark en het Citadelpark.
host_about:
Een gezin die het avontuur van zijn leven begon in een historisch pand te Gent.  Je kan ons vinden op de kunstenkilometer van Gent: het SMAK, MSK en de Bijlokesite (met o.a. name: Shelter 7 - your hideout for Oikofilia
description:
Een heel stadswoning voor jullie alleen? Shelter7 is een moderne architecturale parel midden in het centrum van Gent. Een mix van brutalisme, minimalisme en Wabi Sabi.
De voorgevel bestaat uit een betonnen structuur, die de krijtlijn vormt van een oude afdruk. De vide brengt licht van buiten naar binnen. Een verrassende combinatie van 3 etages bestemd om elke gast tot rust te brengen. Oikofilie op zijn best.
Shelter7 is een B&E, een bed & experience, het biedt extra ervaringen op maat.

The space
Shelter7. Een inspirerende ruimte die Wabi Sabi uitademt en fungeert als rustpunt, een stilteoord binnen de bruisende stad. Een plek die je even naar een hoger niveau tilt en die jou en je gasten bijblijft, modern met een hoek af, een onafgewerkte cirkel van zenitude.
neighborhood_overview: Midden in het historisch stadscentrum, op 50 meter van het Belfort, op 100 meter van het stadshuis en stadshal, op 250 meter van de Graslei en op minder als 500 meter van het Gravensteen. Maar toch in een gezellig, rustiger straatje.
host_about: Happy, curious, positive person who likes to travel, meet, learn, explore and meet new people & energies

name: Beautiful & Spacious Private room in City Center I
description:
Beautiful and authentic city house recently renovated with a modern touch and respect to the original architecture.

Beautiful and spacious room with lots of natural light and en-suite bathroom.

Located by the old town city center, 10 min walk to the Korenmarkt, Kouter, Graslei, Gravensteen, Sint-Bavo Cathedral and many more tourist attractions. Perfectly located.

As a Ghent native, I have a long list of recommendations; going from attractions, restaurants and other fun things to do.

The space
Private room with on-suite bathroom:
- Beautiful, spacious and modern room with authentic brick wall, 2 windows inviting in the light and high ceilings.
- Rooms are located on the 1st floor
- When entering the house, follow the hall to the stairs, go up the stairs to the first floor where you can find your room.
- Coffee and tea are available in the rooms
- City map and list of recommendations available in the roo
neighborhood_overview:
My house is located right by the historic hart of the city center in one of the most authentic, lovely and high end neighbourhoods of Ghent. Surrounded by the 2 famous rivers Schelde and Leie, running through Ghent and coming together crossing paths at the end of my street right by the picturesque Lindelei/Recollettenlei where you can also find a number of lovely restaurants, bars, brunch places and charming shops next to the water. All of the historic churches and squares are located within a 2km radius or 10 to 15 minute walk from my house.

Tip: definitly dont miss a photo opp at the Sint Michiels Bridge overlooking the magical Korenlei, Graslei and Gravensteen castle in the background.

It is a scenic 10 minute walk to the Sint-Bavo's Catherdral where you can admire the world famous Ghent Altarpiece - The Adoration of the Mystic Lamb by the Renaissance painter brothers Hubert and Jan Van Eyck.

Moreover I live in a very lively, young and vibrant ne
host_about:
Hello! My name is Marieke, I am 29years old and live in the beautiful city of Ghent. 

I was born and raised in this magical place that I am fortunate enough to call home but also lived and studied abroad for 8 adventurous years (from the age of 16 till 24) 

I lived in various places and countries, ranging from the UK to Spain, Switzerland and Hong Kong. I am always happy to share my stories with people who are interested and equally love meeting new people who are open minded and up for a chat. 

My friends tell me im a very positive and vibrant sunshine child, aswel as a dynamic, energetic and emphatic person. I love helping others and challenging myself, always looking to push my own boundaries whilst maintaining a balanced lifestyle. 

I am also a full blown foodaholic, i love food more than I can put into words .. so I can definitely give you all the best places to visit in and around Ghent :D Furthermore do I love hanging out with my friends, organising events, Yoga, Running, Tennis and just being active in general. Fun fact: i don’t drink alcohol 

So I look forward to welcoming you in my hometown and learning more about you as a person! 

Tot snel x

name: Studio Black Cat — Ghent downtown
description:
Cosy studio hidden behind Ghent's greenest facade. Fully furnished for a short break or long stay in the heart of Medieval Flanders.

The space
The studio has a private entrance, its own bathroom, an equipped kitchen, a seating and dining space and a sleeping area.

Guest access
The studio has a seperate street entrance so we can offer our guests complete privacy.
neighborhood_overview:
Our studio is located in the city centre. As the city of Ghent is not a gigantic metropolis, all must sees are within walking distance. Public transport is just around the corner, and the connection to both of Ghent's train stations is excellent.
How about a morning stroll along the gorgeous 'Visserij', taking you straight into Portus Ganda? Or wander through the cobblestone squares and alleys along the towers of the city's historic heart?
Around the corner you'll find an artisanal bakery and a small supermarket providing you with everything to kickstart your day. Alongside the Lousbergskaai there is the Lousbergmarkt with local produce from organic farmers, bakers & cheesemakers. Or would you rather wine & dine? Don't hesitate to contact us for suggestions!

The space
We offer you a bedroom with shared bathroom in our house. The bedroom is located on the second floor and the bathroom on the first floor. We have a spacious bathroom with shower, bathtube and toilet. We also have a separate toilet at the ground floor in our hallway. Wi-Fi is available in both rooms.
host_about: Ik ben een student uit de mooie studentenstad Gent en heb in 2014 een leuke Erasmus ervaring opgedaan in Dijon. Ik hou ervan leuke stadjes in Europa te ontdekken. In september waag ik mij ook aan een avontuurlijk reisje naar Peru. Verder hou ik van lekkere biertjes en doe daarom ook mijn stage in de Gentse Stadsbrouwerij. Mijn vrije tijd besteed ik aan sporten, vrienden en mijn vriendin! Samen gezellig bijpraten op café of thuis.

Just Next to the room you will find a beautiful spa designed bathroom with tush and toilet . There is also extra open space in this floor with sofa and sitting area.

Our kitchen is relatively small but you will find everything you need for basic cooking and I’m always there to assist.

I

Quartier Leonard II - Michelangelo Suite is located in the Binnenstad district of Ghent, 700 metres from Ghent Christmas Market, 600 metres from Graffiti Street and 600 metres from Ghent City Hall. This apartment is 2 km from Great Butchers' Hall and 1 km from Castle of Gerald the Devil.

host_about: I'm a young guy enjoying life, dreamer, making my own business.  Love cocktails and a good party!

name: Urban Loft | A unique spot to start your discovery
description:
Welcome at Urban Loft. Together with my husband Joachim we created this place situated in 'Machariuswijk' in the city center of Ghent. Urban Loft offers two private rooms with both their own private terrace and bathroom (both can be reserved separately).

If you like to enjoy, relax and discover Ghent
If you like to start your discovery in a unique place (building, room, environment)
If you are a food lover & desire to discover more?

--> Meaning common ground <--

Urban Loft is your spot.

The space
A double bedroom with a private bathroom AND a private terrace.
It is possible to rent two (identical) rooms when you are travelling with 3 or 4.

Guest access
You have access to your own bedroom, private bathroom and private terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
We are situated in a very unique part of Ghent. Unique in a way that we live within the city center of Ghent amongst a true diversity AND very close to transport possibilities, including railway station (Gent Dampoort) which is in fact the true main station as it is the closest to the city center.

This neighbourhood offers also nice restaurants and places to discover without being annoyed by too many people or noises.
From this place you can discover anything you want within the city center on foot. If you like to explore it differently you can, there are places where you can rent a bike, boat, stand up paddle, ...

You receive our personal recommendations and information in a brochure we have made for our guests. You receive this upon your arrival or earlier.
host_about:
Hi. I am Anissa. Mother of Nina, happily married to my husband Joachim and owner of my business. What do we have in common? Quite some things but what is really clear is that we are all three food (&drink) lovers. 

For business trips I choose to be in an inspiring environment where I can be at ease. I love to learn and support growing other people.

When going on a trip with my family we love to discover places and explore local habits (foods and drinks included ;) as well as beautiful architecture. 
Once in a year we take a longer break were we slow down, reflect on the past year at different levels, relax and enjoy each others presence. 

We also opened 'UrbanLoft' ourselves in Sept 2020. A lovely place in the heart of Ghent /Belgium.

name: Spacious first floor house with homely feeling
description:
You rent from us a recently renovated first floor home. You enter through a private groundfloor front door, and arrive on the first floor in one open living space and connecting green and south-facing roof terrace.

On the second floor there is a hall with seating area and adjoining terrace + the master bedroom and bathroom. A second smaller but cozy bedroom is located under the roof. Nicely integrated custom furniture keeps the rooms sober and tidy.

The space
This first floor house has been finished to perfection. Renovated with an eye for light and spaciousness. Large glass surfaces give every room a lot of daylight and an unobstructed view. Finishes in soft gray tones combined with bleached wood give the house a relaxed atmosphere. Decorations and furniture are tuned to each other and provide a warm and homely feeling. Two terraces (one on each floor) give breathing space to the house and a view of the green inner area.
neighborhood_overview:
You stay in a quiet residential area 10 minutes from the center (bicycle / tram), close to a train station, and easy connection with the motorway.

There is always parking space in front and a tram stop + bakery within walking distance (300 m). Also there is a large nature park (Gentbrugse meersen) close by.

name: Ground floor apartment with terrace
description:
- Beautiful and spacious apartment located in a prime location in Ghent.
- Enjoy the terrace in summer
- The apartment is equipped with all modern comfort so that you feel completely at home.
- You will be able to self check-in yourself upon arrival.

The space
This is a perfect accommodation for 2 in a great location in the centre of Gent, easily walkable to the centre of the town, restaurants, cafes, a park and local shops. The kitchen is very well equipped and the apartment has everything you might need. There's a bathroom w shower, sink and toilet. There's an efficient check-in/check-out process.

Free fast WiFi is available during your stay.

The accommodation is located on the ground floor (level 0)

- clean 100% cotton sheets and towels - all pressed of course!

We really hope you enjoy yo
neighborhood_overview: We’re situated in the medieval centre of Ghent. The neighborhood is characterized as cozy and vibrant. A lot of restaurants and bars are just around the corner at walking distance. The main attractions in Ghent are easily reached on foot: Korenmarkt, Sint-Michiels church, St Niklaas church, the Belfry, St Baafscathedral, Graslei, Gravensteen, Vrijdagsmarkt, St Jacobs church, Portus Ganda, Patershol, Kouter, etc. You're right in the city center so everything you need is within walking distance; tourist sights, attractions, grocery stores, public transportation, etc. We'll gladly give  you information about all this when you arrive.
host_about:
Being born and raised in Ghent, I have a particulair and profound love for this magnificent city. Although I've always lived here, I still enjoying strolling around, looking up at the beautiful facades of the houses. Everytime I still discover something new, that's why I love this city so much. Ever changing, but yet so full of history.
I enjoy cooking and travelling to far off places to discover new cultures and habits. I hope your stay with us in our city can procure you joy and amazement

name: Spacious bedroom in the green region of Ghent
description:
We're happy to welcome you to our home!

Spacious bedroom on the second floor with kingsize bed (1m80 - box spring mattress), own sink, cosy living area with tea corner and touristic information.

Our shared bathroom has a shower, standalone bath, 2 sinks, toilet and all supplies you need. There's an extra toilet on the ground floor.

You're welcome in our garden with view over the fields! You may use our BBQ during summer.

The space
The room is situated on the second floor of our house. You can only reach it through the stairs in the main hallway. The bathroom is close to your bedroom. All rooms can be locked.

Other things to note
Non-smoking home.
neighborhood_overview: During your stay you'll have 2 FREE bicycle available. Our home is surrounded by nature and lays on the Knooppuntenroute (Google: Fietsnet - knooppunt 69) so there are a lot of bicycle trails a stone's throw away. Our garden borders the fields (hello, cows!) so you'll also find a lot of hiking trails worth a shot.
host_about:
Hi, I’m Louise and I’m living with my fiancé and most adorable cat in Drongen, my hometown since I was born. 

Drongen is only a 15-minute drive away from Ghent. The highway to Bruges and Brussels is around the corner. We lived a few months in the city center of Ghent but I couldn’t miss the countryside so we came back and bought our first home. 
Our best neighbors are the cows & they sure give us a spectacular view from the garden. If you love nature, you can use our bikes and go for a nice drive alongside the river Leie. Drongen is also known as “the green lungs of Ghent”!

name: Leuke stijlvolle kamer met privé badkamer
description:
Moderne slaapkamer met eigen badkamer, op enkele minuten van het Sint-Pietersstation. Openbaar vervoer (trein, bus, tram, taxi,...) in de onmiddellijke omgeving. Ook dichtbij het stadscentrum van Gent. Geniet van de toffe authentieke winkeltjes zoals Tierentyn mosterd, het kleinste huisje van Gent is nu een drankgelegenheid 't Galgenhuisje. Of degusteer in Het Bierhuis aan de Waterkant van een lekker Belgisch biertje. Stadswandelingen zijn ook aan te raden en kan verzorgd worden.

The space
Je verblijft in een pas vernieuwde slaapkamer met tweepersoonbed (160cm) met eigen badkamer en bureau. TV en WiFi (of netwerk), kleine frigo, Nespresso en waterkoker aanwezig. !! Keuken is enkel te gebruiken bij langere verblijven vanaf 4weken!!

Guest access
enkel toegang tot eigen kamer
neighborhood_overview: toffe stationsbuurt met leuke terrasjes of neem de tram achter de hoek naar het centrum.

name: The Cover hostel - 3 Rooms 15 beds
description:
Welcome to 'The Cover': new and charming hostel located in the middle of the historical center of Ghent. Located on the beautiful Vrijdagmarkt, the perfect spot to explore the historical, cultural and night life in Ghent. All facilities are available and free to use: kitchen, showers (6), washer and dryer, lockers, dining room, relaxation room, free WIFI. We are looking forward to welcome you!

The space
The hostel is a part of the multi-purpose bar 'The Cover'. Well-known in and around Ghent for his unique atmosphere. Grab a great Belgian beer at the bar, watch one of the many bands or dj's playing in the evening or just enjoy the amazing view from the terrace. Don't worry: the hostel is separated from the bar so you can still relax the silence and charm if you prefer so. All the major spots for sight-seeing, exploring, nightlife, culture or museums are just a walk away.
neighborhood_overview: Vrijdagmarkt, located in the middle of the historical center: Gravensteen castle, Graslei, Korenmarkt, Vlasmarkt, the 'towers of Ghent', Patershol are just a stone-trow away.

The space
Beeldentuintje met eigen creaties alsook zelf ontworpen decoratieve objecten in de verschillende leefruimtes.

Guest access

name: JunoBoat floating  accommodation on the water
description:
JunoBoat is een unieke vakantiewoning voor maximum 8 personen op het water, gecombineerd met hotelservice. (Opgemaakte bedden en handdoekenpakket zijn inbegrepen in de prijs.)

De vakantiewoning op het water beschikt over 3 aparte slaapkamers met douche en/of ligbad met zicht op de Muinkschelde. De binnentuin verhoogt het vakantiegevoel alsook de gezellige zitruimte en volledig ingerichte keuken.

The space
Junoboat is een woonboot met 3 slaapkamers, twee badkamer, een volledig ingerichte keuken en een zithoek. Junoboat heeft een moderne uitstraling.
neighborhood_overview:
Junoboat is gelegen in de Stropkaai, dicht bij het S.M.A.K gent. Gent is een fantastische stad waar er via zijn uitgebreid net van waterwegen tot in het ommeland zeer veel pittoreske hoekjes te ontdekken zijn.

VlotGent biedt je varende terrassen aangedreven met fluister-stille elektromotoren, die enkel op basis van zonne- en windenergie worden voortgestuwd.
host_about:
Hallo,
Wij zijn moeder en dochter en kunnen heel goed samenwerken. Ik werk in de Immo wereld, dus administratieve taken zijn mij niet vreemd. Mijn mama neemt het praktische voor haar rekening (inrichting, poetsen enzoverder). Beide geven we de gasten graag een welkom gevoel aan onze mooie westkust en onze vakantieboot in Gent

name: Imagine! Sleeping in the centre of Medieval Ghent
description:
Burgstraat 17 is an old Patrician house constructed in 1515. Later the house was split in 2 houses and became neglected for many years. In 2019 we started the renovation, with as only purpose, to keep the soul and respect the history and grandeur of the original house.
Its exceptional history, unique architecture and central position made it worth doing so.
Tears, joy and a lot of work resulted in the place where you are right now. We hope you enjoy and respect this place as much as we do.

The space
We created this apartment as a place of relaxation for ourselves. We are proud to share with you
1) Abundance of natural light
2) Authenticity and respect for the history
3) Comfort with subtle flavours of luxury and comfort
4) Personal well-being and relaxation

For parking space @ 20€/day, please send me a message
neighborhood_overview: The accomodation is located in the car free centre, in the middle of many romantic restaurants , typical bars,  historical buildings such as the Gravensteen, Korenmarkt, Graslei, .... and the shopping area. The parking is reachable by car. Normal electricity is available for charging.

name: Welcome in Ghent: private newly renovated house
description:
Our recently renovated house on 5 min from the city centre is welcoming, cozy and rich of light.On the ground floor there is an open and well equipped kitchen.You can relax in the living room and enjoy the space.There is wifi and television you can use.On the 1st floor there is one master bedroom and a spacious bathroom with bath and double douche. On the 2th floor there are 2 bedrooms, one with a single bed, the other one has a big mezzanine with 2 single beds.

The space
Our house gives you immediately a relax feeling. It offers you everthing for a comfortabel stay; cozy living room with a nice floor if we may believe our visitors ;-) , a well equipped bathroom and good beds. The house has 2 terrasses to relax outside. The house offers you the perfect stay for a family. You'll feel at home here!
neighborhood_overview:
There is bus 3 around the corner, in 2 min you are in the city centre. You are close to the centre.
Our neighbourhood is colourfull and has a cozy artistic atmosphere. There are shops, coffeeshops, restaurants and a few really nice bars.
You'll like the lively artistic spots in the neighbourhood.
host_about: Hello! We look forward welcoming you in our city and in our home.

name: bohemian room in spacious flat with cat
description:
- Cosy & bright room with comfortable bed (1.60 m) in a large apartment
- close to the city centre, Capitole Theatre, Concert Venue Vooruit and the small beguinage;
- Fully equipped kitchen with lots of spices :-);
- Bathroom & toilet are shared;
- The apartment is at the 2nd floor (with elevator);
- The living room is cosy & filled with plants.
- Otto the cat doesn't come into your room if you don't want to.
- cosy terrace in the living room free to use

The space
In your room there is a comfy bed (1.60 m), a wardrobe, a desk, a mirror and towels. The room is in the back of the building, where it is very quiet at night.

It has easy access to al nearby highways, a tram line that runs straight to the city centre of Ghent and this while being in a quiet neighbourhood. name: Heaven@11, a jewel among other historic buildings.
description:
Heaven @11 is an apartment on floor 1 & 2 of a small historic house in the medivial center of Gent.
Although the street is a pedestrian zone, you can reach the location by car. Shops, restaurants, museums etc . . .

The space
The apartment is spacious & features a private terras, fully equiped kitchen and large dining area on the first floor. The second floor has a sitting
area with broad library and an ensuite bedroom with flat screen TV, comfortable bed, private bathroom with shower and fast WiFi connection. The view in front and the back of the house are both typical charming scenes of an authentique medieval quarter in East Flanders.
neighborhood_overview: Het Patershol is een oude wijk in het historische centrum van de Belgische stad Gent en telt een gesloten stratenpatroon dat het uit de middeleeuwen heeft bewaard. Deze bijzonder mooie hoek van Gent is een stad-in-de-stad. Vergeet even waar je bent en laat je onderdompelen in de middeleeuwen. Snuif de nostalgie van oude leefgewoonten op. Geniet van architectuur en kunst. En zeker van de pittoreske straten vol gezellige restaurants, volkse cafés en hippe bars. Het Patershol en de omgeving werden in 1981 beschermd als stadsgezicht.
host_about:
P Roelens, interior architect.
K Vandekerkhove, visual communication

name: 3: Gezellige studio voor twee personen.
description:
Charmant rijhuis met authentieke elementen in het centrum van Gent. Het huis bevindt zich net binnen de UNESCO werelderfgoed omgeving van de prachtige Gentse binnenstad, maar even goed in de buurt van de belangrijkste invalswegen net buiten de lage emissie zone. Alles binnen wandelafstand. Ook het centraal station, trams en bussen zijn er vlakbij. Een ideale uitvalsbasis!

Guest access
De woning heeft 3 ruime en gezellig ingerichte, lichtrijke kamers. Tot de gemeenschappelijke ruimtes behoren de woonkamer, ruime keuken, grote badkamer met bad, douche en toilet, leuk terras en extra gastentoilet op de benedenverdieping.
neighborhood_overview:
Het huis staat middenin de historische 'Muinkparkwijk' waar zich tussen 1850 en begin 1900 de dierentuin van Gent bevond. Vandaar dat alle straatnamen in de buurt naar dieren zijn vernoemd. een geschiedenis die zeker de moeite waard is om verder te ontdekken!
De binnenstad is te voet te bereiken binnen 20 minuten door een mooie wandeling langs oa de Sint-Pieters abdij, het prachtige Vooruit gebouw en niet te vergeten langs de binnenwateren die Gent rijk is.
host_about: Wij zijn Floris en Annelies, airbnb host in Oudenaarde en in Gent.

name: Cozy stay in the Historic centre of Ghent
description:
Our trendy accommodation is located in the centre of Ghent. The main market square is only 100 meters away.
There's a private bathroom with toilet, shower and sink.
We offer free Wifi and television.
Public parking "Vrijdagsmarkt" is nearby to park your car: 23€/24h.

There's an efficient check-in/-out process

The space

neighborhood_overview: The accommodation can't be more central (!), located in a very calm alley between the waterside and one of the main shopping streets. Korenmarkt, Vrijdagsmarkt, Gravensteen all super close... The ideal hideout to explore thé most beautiful city of Belgium.
host_about:
Hi, we are Astrid and Gilles, 27 and 33. Born and raised in Moorslede and Bruges, we studied in Ghent and in Brussels. We fell in love and decided to settle in the beautiful city of Ghent. Whilst looking for a place to live, we bumped into what could be considered as one of the most centralised houses of Ghent. The house was old, dark and didn’t catch a lot of sunlight, but we saw a lot of possibilities to transform it into a little paradise in the ancient centre, close to all the hip and trendy places this city has to offer. As we travel a lot ourselves, we think we know what it takes to have a pleasant stay and discovering new cities and countries. We transformed the house in an ideal place for friends and guests visiting Ghent. By the summer of 2020 the house was finished.   
We hope you enjoy it as much as we do. 
Welcome in Ghent! 
Astrid & Gilles
x

host_about:
I'm an artist working and living in Ghent, Flanders in Belgium. I love to go to city's where's a lot of great art and a vibe in the city. We love to stay in large and cosy locations, because we need the space to relax. Beside City trips we like visiting nature and locations with wellness facilities. We embrase every day as a gift and live life to the fullest.

Exentrieke Scandinavische villa is gebouwd & geklasseerd bij Naoorlogs Erfgoed Vlaanderen . Op een boogscheut van het charmante Gent . Ideaal voor 10 personen. Hier vertoeven is een beleving , grote tuin & klein bosje met vuurpit en boomhutje
Stad & natuur gaan hier hand in hand . Welkom & Enjoy!

The space
De villa is in de vorm van een vlinder. Volledig symmetrisch en alles is nog maar net verbouwd van 2020. Een open keuken met zicht op de velden, terras met de zon die opkomt. Een eetruimte , een living met als hart een gezellige pellet kachel in het midden. Een bureelruimte ( met slaapsofa voor 2 personen) Beneden een eigen badkamer met toilet. Bovenverdiep telt 3 slaapkamers. + Badkamer met bad en douche. Een mezzanine met leesplekje .

Guest acc
neighborhood_overview:
Op Fietsafstand van het historisch centrum Gent ( 5 km)
De villa kijkt uit op velden en kastelen . Prachtige wandelomgeving!
Een subtropisch zwembad & Wellness op wandelafstand ( 2 km)
Een prachtige brouwerij met heerlijk bier en lekker eten ( 1 km)
2 Bakkers & top slager op 100 meter .
Buurtwinkel 7/7 op 100 meter

Galische hoeve ( 1 km )
host_about:
We Are Travellers. How adventurous are you?
Collect moments, not things...
Travelling is like falling in love, you are less critical and only see the nice things...
Hi dear friends!! Welcome to Casita Loquita!!

Cozy apartment 3 minutes from the central train station of Ghent, thanks to which it has great, direct transport options to all Belgian airports and transport hubs, big cities like Brussels, Bruges, and Antwerp, and all major attractions.

Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom, two double bed bedrooms, and located in a lovely neighborhood. The apartment is also well-connected with all of Ghent's own hotspots thanks to the biggest public transport hub of Ghent being next to the station!

The space
The apartment is on the third floor of a renovated building in one of the best-located streets in Ghent. The guests can make use of the whole apartment; two double-bed bedrooms, a balcony, bathroom, living room, and kitchen.

Finally, Ghent’s most renowned museums and biggest municipal park are all a 5 to 15 minute walk away from the front door.

name: Vintage caravannetje in ecologische tuin te Gent.
description:
Glamping in een vintage Rapido caravannetje. Een knus plekje in onze ecologisch ingerichte tuin. In de caravan is er plaats voor 2 volwassenen en de bank kan omgevormd worden tot nog een dubbelbed.
Voor de sanitaire voorzieningen kunt u gebruik maken van onze badkamer in huis. Aparte toegang tot de caravan langs de achtertuin. Op 5 km van centrum Gent en achter in de tuin vertrekt een wandelpad. Mooie omgeving met vele fietsroutes doorheen de Leie streek.

The space
In de caravan vind je een klein dubbel bed (140 x 200 cm) opgemaakt met 2 éénpersoonsdonsdekens en kussens. Aan de andere kant van de caravan wordt de bank omgevormd tot 2 bedden. Kom je met kinderen, breng dan enkel slaapzakken mee voor hen. Lakens en kussens voorzien wij.
Er is een aparte koelkast in de tuin ter beschikking voor onze gasten.

Other things to note
Indien gewenst zorgen wij voor een lekker ontbijt (niet inbegrepen in de prijs). Laat ons dat dan op voorh
neighborhood_overview:
Drongen is een landelijke randgemeente van Gent met 3 prachtige natuurgebieden op een paar km afstand. De Bourgoyen, de Oude Kale Vallei en de Vinderhoutse bossen.
Recreatiedomein de Blaarmeersen ligt vlakbij, indien je graag wil zwemmen (met strandje) of sporten.
Liever wat cultuur? Met de bus of fiets sta je in een mum van tijd in centrum Gent!

name: Sleeping on a boat - Ecohostel
description:
Ship ahoy!
Looking for a hostel that shows the spirit of Ghent? Somehow different, friendly, fun, but most of all relaxed?

It's not everyday you can be a pirate, you might as well go for it! Don't forget that land was only created to provide a place for boats to moor... You'll find the boat on a lazy canal just outside the historic centre, quiet, lush and green.

So hopefully you'll love Ghent as much as we do!!

The space
We offer 4 rooms, two with a double bed, one room with 3 bunk beds and one room with 4 bunk beds.
Bed linnen is included in the price, as well as pillows and duvets.

The hostel can at the moment only be booked completely. The number of people staying is up to you but maximum 10 (due to the covid 19). A group with more than 10 can contact us for possible reservations with more guests.

name: Unique experience - spacious boathouse near center
description:
Cosy yet spacious and warmly decorated appartment on my house boat Aurelia Feria, where i live also with my 2 kids (co-parenting)

- a 15min walk to the city center and at 2min walk from the train station.

- ATTENTION: be aware,the airbnb is adjacent to my private living area. You have the airbnb space to yourself but the wall between the 2 parts is not accoustically isolated so for sound you are not completely private. You can not see each other, but you can hear sounds from the other side .

The space
you have a whole space of 60m2 to yourself, next to my private part of the boat.

Furthermore there is a spacious deck to enjoy the sun and views as well as a glass roof above the living area that opens to have a cool breeze or lots of natural light streaming in. It is exceptional for a houseboat to draw so much light in. In winter there is a cosy stove to keep your feet warm.

you can expect:
- a bath in front of a
neighborhood_overview:
The boat is located at the entrance of the 'new docks' (Nieuwe Dokken), an area just next to the center where in the past this was an industrial area, operating over water.
This whole area (that used to be 'the old docks') has recently been developed (and still is) with areas to live, schools, open space, playground, beach, bars, cycling path, walking path, etc. New neighboorhood that due to Corona is now also being discovered by the Ghentians, for walking and cycling, and for water activities. It is still a quiet place so close to the city, train station and the ring of Ghent. But fun on the water (lots of kayaking, little boats, rubber boats, paddle boarding) is popular nowadays and it comes close, since you are also on the water ,-) and people are curious to see life on a boat.

The boat is next to a quay and a cycling path. There is no car road, only a simple road where residents can load and unload the car, as can you if you come with the car.

Unfortun
host_about:
Hi, I am Lies, mother of Viggo, 9 years old and Raffi, almost 8 years old. They alternate between me and their dad every other week.  

3 years ago, when their father and I got separated, I was looking for a house or an appartment for me and my 2 kids, but appartments turned out to be too expensive. On my search I accidentally bumped into a house boat for sale. Since I had been dreaming about this in earlier years, I decided to jump in the deep water ;-) and bought the Aurelia Feria end of 2017. It is a 'spits', used to be a cargo boat of 40 m long and was build end of the 60's. 

Since January 2020 the boat is back at its permanent own spot on the water after a thorough renovation. And my children as well as me are enjoying our new home to the fullest, even though it is not completely finished and I can not see, feel or smell paint anymore. 
I myself am an independant psychologist doing projects in HR for the moment, but as said in the boat description, I will be using the boatloft also as my working place to guide groups and individuals on their quest to connection, with themselves, with others and with the world around them. 

 And at the same time, I want to also offer it to people all around the world to come and experience life on a boat and discover the fantastic city of Ghent, where I have been living for the last 20 years. Let me know what the space brings you or still needs to serve its purpose. 
For people who are interested in exploring themselves, a coaching session can also be arranged :-)

description:
The house with patio and garden is located close to the city centre (15 min by bike), near the river Schelde (ideal for walks), bus & tram, stores, the UZ hospital & near the station (5 min by bike). Ideal for a couple or a family with kids.

Perfectly situated to visit Ghent, Bruges, Antwerp & Brussels.

The space
The house has a nice garden with a swing, surrounded by beautiful trees. It's a spacious and bright house, with a fully equipped kitchen. Its modern feel with vintage elements give it a nice authentic character.

If the weather permits, there is a small swimming pool available for the kids.

name: De mooiste zolder van Gent
description:
Zeer ruime zolderkamer in het hartje van Gent. Perfecte uitvalsbasis om de stad te verkennen of om even tot adem te komen. Bovenop een goede nachtrust heb je de ochtendzon door het veluxraam. Gebruik gerust de platendraaier om het nog aangenamer te maken! Chambre agréable avec double lit. Nous vous souhaitons un agréable séjour et profitez de notre petit jardin . Pleasant Room in a mansion from 1908. We hope you'll enjoy your stay and you are welcome to use our garden.

The space
De zolderkamer is een eigen, afgesloten plek. we garanderen alle privacy
neighborhood_overview:
In onze straat is er een mix van gezinswoningen en raamprostitutie. Er is heel wat controle op straat waardoor het echt wel veilig is. éénmaal binnen in ons huis zal je daar niets meer van merken. We houden van de rust in ons huis.
We wonen in het centrum van Gent en hebben heel wat leuke restaurantjes in de onze buurt.

name: Gezellig gerenoveerd huisje in Gentbrugge
description:
This recently renovated and cosy house is all yours! The house is easy to reach by train or car and is ideally located if you are planning a city trip to Ghent, or if you want a good base to discover Bruges, Antwerp, Brussels or the coast.
The house is located in trendy Gentbrugge, a 10-minute bike ride from the Ghent city centre. There are numerous parks (including the Gentbrugse Meersen), public transport stops, restaurants and shops within walking distance.

The space
On the top floor you will find a large bedroom with double bed and room for an inflatable (children's) bed (provided in the house). There is also a large air mattress for older children or extra guests. On the first floor there is the living room, a separate toilet, a bathroom with rain shower and a storage room with a laundry room. On the ground floor there is a large, fully equipped kitchen and a small office. You also have access to the city terrace from here.

Guest access<
neighborhood_overview: Gentbrugge is a quiet but trendy neighborhood south-east of Ghent Center. The main assets are the excellent accessibility and the combination of the village feeling and the proximity to the city center. Although the neighborhood where the house is located is primarily a residential area, there are plenty of nice bars, restaurants and stores within walking distance.
host_about:
I work as a consultant for several NGOs in the field of 'open science'. I travel about 25% of my time, and often I prefer the more personal Airbnb experience over sterile hotel rooms. 
I'm quite passionnate about my work, so I have a preference for listings offering solid wifi and a working space. But when not working, I enjoy good food and cooking, being on the road, finding great bars and pubs, and reading everything I can lay my hands on. 
Looking forward to meeting you!

neighborhood_overview: Het Patershol is een oude wijk in het historische centrum van de Belgische stad Gent en telt een gesloten stratenpatroon dat het uit de middeleeuwen heeft bewaard. Geniet van architectuur en kunst. En zeker van de pittoreske straten vol gezellige restaurants, volkse cafés en hippe bars. Het Patershol en de omgeving werden in 1981 beschermd als stadsgezicht.

name: rooftop apartment with a stunning view
description:
The apartment is located in the very city centre of Ghent. Whatever you’re looking for in our beautiful city, it’s all at walking distance. The space
Besides the two bedrooms you’ll find an equipped kitchen, bathroom with shower and a cosy living room. The kitchen is a little bit old fashioned (I am saving money for a new one), but has everything you need. Towels, bedsheets and shower gel are provided as well. An absolute plus is the pleasant terrace. From your breakfast in the morning until your nightcap, you can enjoy the sun while admiring the stunning view over the city.

name: Cosy room in apartment near centre of Ghent
description: The apartment is situated at the second floor of the building. The room has a double sofa bed. It has a window with entrance to a terrace (shared with the neighbors). The rest of the apartment is shared with us: bath room, separate toilet, kitchen and living room. The bath room has a bath/shower (towels, soap, … are provided), the kitchen has everything to cook/reheat a (own) meal and the living room has 1 big and 2 little sofa’s, big table and beautiful view from the big window!
neighborhood_overview:
You need 3 minutes to walk from station Gent Dampoort to our place. Walking to the centre takes about 20 minutes (or 10 minutes with the bus). Busses to all around Ghent just in front of the building. Just over the square you have a big supermarket (Carrefour and Tevhid). Close by the apartment you have a bakery, butcher, newspaper kiosk, places to eat (pitta, fries, sandwiches, Italian restaurant, …) or go for breakfast.
Parking your car is quite expensive (free on Sundays)! You can park it at the station for about 20 euros (per day) or at the parking in front of the building with the parking meter.

name: Oude jeneverbrouwerij van 1740
description:
Het huis dateert van 1740 en was origineel een jeneverbrouwerij. In 2017 werd het volledig gerenoveerd met behoud van zoveel mogelijk authentieke elementen in combinatie met een eigentijdse inrichting. De houten balken en vloeren brengen je terug naar vroeger, de stalen trappen, moderne afwerking en het losstaand bad doen je genieten en ontspannen in stijl. Er is plaats voor maximum 6 personen. Je hebt 3 slaapkamers (met telkens een tweepersoonsbed) en 2 badkamers als je Peper boekt.

The space
Peper is eat, sleep, wine. Op het gelijkvloers vind je ons restaurant waar je kan brunchen, lunchen en dineren. We hebben een authentieke wijnkelder en werken met een coole wijnmachine waar je kan proeven van 16 verschillende wijnen. Vanop het eerste verdiep kom je in onze gerestaureerde B&B waar je met maximum 6 personen kan verblijven. Eerste verdieping: een gezellige living met een volledig uitgeruste kitchenette, bar en sofa. De originele houten vloeren en balken bl
neighborhood_overview: Peper ligt op 5 minuten van het Gravensteen en op 8 minuten van de Korenmarkt in een rustige buurt. Naast ons vind je het oude Elisabeth Begijnhof wat zeker een bezoekje waard is.
host_about: Welkom bij Peper. Peper is eat, sleep, wine. Samen met mijn man Philip hebben we een restaurant, wijnbar en B&B in Gent.

In dit ruim gelijkvloersappartement kan u genieten. Het terras en het tuintje zorgen voor een extra troef. De tramlijn richting centrum Gent ligt om de hoek. Er is gratis parking in de straat. In de buurt zijn heel wat winkels aanwezig. Op zondag kan je te voet naar de markt (Van Beverenplein). Wandelen kan je in de buurt, de Westerbegraafplaats of in het mooie natuurreservaat de Ossemeersen aan de Bourgoyen. Wie van Gent centrum wil genieten neemt de tram en stapt af aan Het Gravensteen.

The space
Het appartement is uiterst geschikt om met 6 personen te vertoeven. Het is ruim en heeft een tuintje. Je hebt alles wat je nodig hebt voor een aangenaam verblijf!

Alle ruimtes in het appartement zijn beschikbaar! Zo beschik je over een ruime badkamer, een washok, een ingerichte keuken, een ruime eetplaats en salon
en ruime slaapkamers.
neighborhood_overview: In de buurt heb je veel supermarkten. Aldi, lidl, delhaize, colruyt.... Ook zijn er mogelijkheden om uit eten te gaan. Baptiste aan den dries is een gezellig en lekker restaurant. Je kan rustig gaan wandelen in de buurt, er is ook een fietspad die je richting Gent centrum brengt.... Ook de tramlijn 1 brengt je naar Gent centrum en ligt een straat achter het appartement.
